column1: |","Hornopiren, Chile",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/create-an-ecovillage-and-plant-an-ancient-forest/pica
0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""> <h3>

This campaign has ended but you can come here  http://motos4mongolia.wix.com/benefit To contribute and be entertained.


We are raising money to buy 20 new Yamaha motorcycles for National Park Rangers of  Ulaan Taiga. Last year's campaign was very successful and made a big difference in the preservation of a treasured place. Help us reach our goal by contributing through this site for motorcycles and gear for the rangers or you can
column2: panel1-6"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">give to the cause through the Blue Waves Campaign.

column1: We thank each and every one of our donors for their support.
<h3><span style=""font-weight: normal

I have always enjoyed the beautiful wilderness spaces available to us all in and around California, and am passionate about preserving undeveloped space for wildlife habitat and the health of humans. I have fantasized about exploring other parts of the world, and have always thought that the best way to get to know a place is to go there with a purpose!

I am raising funds to buy a motorcycle and gear. On my own dime, I am going to go to Mongolia and deliver them to the rangers in person.
Ulaan Taiga in Hovsgol Province is a special place that needs preserving and protecting!

These National Parks are patrolled by rangers, mostly on horseback or decrepit old motorcycles. The rangers need better transportation to do their job catching poachers and illegal developers, and the motorcycles they have are old, tired and inadequate. The horses are even less effective.
column5: >The Park bigger than Yellowstone at 3,784,130 acres is strictly protected as a transition zone between Central Asian Steppe and the Siberian Taiga. 5 rivers originate from Ulaan Taiga Mountain Rainge and create the headwaters to Yenisei and Selenge rivers. There are 300 small pristine ancient lakes that are more than 2 million years old, and the water is so clean you can drink it without any treatment.  There are a number of indigenous people that depend on these for their water supply. This park is a water shed for Lake Hovsgol, one of the last, ancient largest freshwater lakes in the world. The Mongolians call this body of water ""The Mother Sea"". The Lake and the National Parks around it are unique on this planet, and under threat.

column1: So what's threatening it?

Illegal poaching and over fishing:  The rivers and lakes have fish, including two endemic species, those fish can easily become over fished as every other fish population in the world has become.  The surrounding park lands are home to a number of rare and endangered species, including ibex, argali, elk, wolf, wolverine, musk deer, brown bear, Siberian moose, and sable.

Mongolia has done a good job designating this area as a wildlife preserve to protect the survival of these animals, but enforcement is challenging.  Rangers have been stabbed and injured trying to enforce the law against poachers, who stand to make a great deal of money in the short term.
Illegal Mining: Mongolia is mineral rich and artisanal miners move in destroying and polluting the land and waters. They exploit the region with no regard for preservation of the pristine wildlife.
Illegal development and tourism: It shouldn't be news to Americans that people in and from outside Mongolia are eager to develop properties in the region.

Rangers have caught individuals simply building around it without permits. Run off and pollution from illegal development and road building is certain to pollute the rivers and lake, as well as impact wildlife habitat.  Additionally outsiders have come in and started developing  tourism projects without regard for the environment and without obtaining permits.
But they have rangers to enforce the laws, right?

Yes, the whole park is about 5,900 square miles (1.5 m hectares) and there are 20 permanent rangers and a few seasonal ones.  Each ranger patrols over 300 square miles of park, which is about the same size as all the boroughs in New York City.  And they do it mostly on horseback.    Imagine if there was only one policeman in a space as big as the five boroughs of New York City, and he was on horseback chasing bad guys in jeeps.
The poachers and illegal users in the park tool around in jeeps, 4x4's, and other vehicles.  Did I also mention the poachers are armed?
The rangers have asked for help by in the form of offroad motorcycles, gear, and training.  With modern offroad motorcycles, they could patrol more effectively and discourage lawbreakers.
This is my Park Ranger and with your help I will be delivering a motorcycle to him.
Bayarkhuu Huuhen

I started my career as a Cinema Mechanic. I traveled around showing and promoting international and national films, history, culture, religions, traditions and legends of people. It helped me to develop a deep passion for nature and connection to people. When Mongolia transitioned to market economy in 1990s, people started exploiting the nature and environment. I witnessed illegal logging, depletion of rivers and lakes, poaching and greediness of artisanal miners in our Taiga region. As the condition worsened, I wanted to strengthen my devotion to nature by becoming a ranger and promised to make a difference. I patrol 100 thousand acres.
So why do I care, and how can I help?
It's true, Mongolia is halfway around the world, but I care, and here's why:
<ul>
• We don't have that many wild places left in the world.
• We don't have that much wildlife left in the world.
• I love motorcycles, and it's not often that my love of motorcycles could have such a huge impact for a good cause.

Even if you aren't moved by this situation, I ask that you support me in my effort to keep this wild area as pristine as possible.   You can help by donating to help cover the cost of  motorcycles and equipment.
Where does the money go?

100% of the money you donate is tax-deductible, and goes to buy and ship the motorcycles and equipment. I am paying my own ticket over, and the Mongol Ecology Center is not taking any of it for administration, it all goes directly to equipment for the rangers!

I am trying to fund  motorcycles and equipment.  Each motorcycle and equipment, along with shipping, costs $6,500. Indigegogo fees on the total amount are $475 ($6,500+$475 = $6,975.00)   I am trying to raise enough to outfit two rangers.  Any additional money goes to buying a third and eventually fourth motorcycle if I exceed my fundraising goal.  I have raised $1000 from a previous campaign.

If I raise additional funds, but not enough for an entire motorcycle and gear, the Mongol Ecology Center has agreed to pool it with the funds raised by other riders to fund another complete motorcycle.

","This campaign has ended but you can come here  http://motos4mongolia.wix.com/benefit To contribute and be entertained.We are raising money to buy 20 new Yamaha motorcycles for National Park Rangers of  Ulaan Taiga. Last year's campaign was very successful and made a big difference in the preservation of a treasured place. Help us reach our goal by contributing through this site for motorcycles and gear for the rangers or you can give to the cause through the Blue Waves Campaign.
We thank each and every one of our donors for their support.
Hi I'm Hilary Davis.

I have always enjoyed the beautiful wilderness spaces available to us all in and around California, and am passionate about preserving undeveloped space for wildlife habitat and the health of humans. I have fantasized about exploring other parts of the world, and have always thought that the best way to get to know a place is to go there with a purpose!I am raising funds to buy a motorcycle and gear. On my own dime, I am going to go to Mongolia and deliver them to the rangers in person.
Ulaan Taiga in Hovsgol Province is a special place that needs preserving and protecting!

These National Parks are patrolled by rangers, mostly on horseback or decrepit old motorcycles. The rangers need better transportation to do their job catching poachers and illegal developers, and the motorcycles they have are old, tired and inadequate. The horses are even less effective. The Park bigger than Yellowstone at 3,784,130 acres is strictly protected as a transition zone between Central Asian Steppe and the Siberian Taiga. 5 rivers originate from Ulaan Taiga Mountain Rainge and create the headwaters to Yenisei and Selenge rivers. There are 300 small pristine ancient lakes that are more than 2 million years old, and the water is so clean you can drink it without any treatment.  There are a number of indigenous people that depend on these for their water supply. This park is a water shed for Lake Hovsgol, one of the last, ancient largest freshwater lakes in the world. The Mongolians call this body of water ""The Mother Sea"". The Lake and the National Parks around it are unique on this planet, and under threat.
So what's threatening it?

Illegal poaching and over fishing:  The rivers and lakes have fish, including two endemic species, those fish can easily become over fished as every other fish population in the world has become.  The surrounding park lands are home to a number of rare and endangered species, including ibex, argali, elk, wolf, wolverine, musk deer, brown bear, Siberian moose, and sable.

Mongolia has done a good job designating this area as a wildlife preserve to protect the survival of these animals, but enforcement is challenging.  Rangers have been stabbed and injured trying to enforce the law against poachers, who stand to make a great deal of money in the short term.
Illegal Mining: Mongolia is mineral rich and artisanal miners move in destroying and polluting the land and waters. They exploit the region with no regard for preservation of the pristine wildlife.
Illegal development and tourism: It shouldn't be news to Americans that people in and from outside Mongolia are eager to develop properties in the region.

Rangers have caught individuals simply building around it without permits. Run off and pollution from illegal development and road building is certain to pollute the rivers and lake, as well as impact wildlife habitat.  Additionally outsiders have come in and started developing  tourism projects without regard for the environment and without obtaining permits.
But they have rangers to enforce the laws, right?

Yes, the whole park is about 5,900 square miles (1.5 m hectares) and there are 20 permanent rangers and a few seasonal ones.  Each ranger patrols over 300 square miles of park, which is about the same size as all the boroughs in New York City.  And they do it mostly on horseback.    Imagine if there was only one policeman in a space as big as the five boroughs of New York City, and he was on horseback chasing bad guys in jeeps.
The poachers and illegal users in the park tool around in jeeps, 4x4's, and other vehicles.  Did I also mention the poachers are armed?
The rangers have asked for help by in the form of offroad motorcycles, gear, and training.  With modern offroad motorcycles, they could patrol more effectively and discourage lawbreakers.
This is my Park Ranger and with your help I will be delivering a motorcycle to him.
Bayarkhuu Huuhen

I started my career as a Cinema Mechanic. I traveled around showing and promoting international and national films, history, culture, religions, traditions and legends of people. It helped me to develop a deep passion for nature and connection to people. When Mongolia transitioned to market economy in 1990s, people started exploiting the nature and environment. I witnessed illegal logging, depletion of rivers and lakes, poaching and greediness of artisanal miners in our Taiga region. As the condition worsened, I wanted to strengthen my devotion to nature by becoming a ranger and promised to make a difference. I patrol 100 thousand acres.
So why do I care, and how can I help?
It's true, Mongolia is halfway around the world, but I care, and here's why:
We don't have that many wild places left in the world.
We don't have that much wildlife left in the world.
I love motorcycles, and it's not often that my love of motorcycles could have such a huge impact for a good cause.

Even if you aren't moved by this situation, I ask that you support me in my effort to keep this wild area as pristine as possible.   You can help by donating to help cover the cost of  motorcycles and equipment.
Where does the money go?

100% of the money you donate is tax-deductible, and goes to buy and ship the motorcycles and equipment. I am paying my own ticket over, and the Mongol Ecology Center is not taking any of it for administration, it all goes directly to equipment for the rangers!

I am trying to fund  motorcycles and equipment.  Each motorcycle and equipment, along with shipping, costs $6,500. Indigegogo fees on the total amount are $475 ($6,500+$475 = $6,975.00)   I am trying to raise enough to outfit two rangers.  Any additional money goes to buying a third and eventually fourth motorcycle if I exceed my fundraising goal.  I have raised $1000 from a previous campaign.

If I raise additional funds, but not enough for an entire motorcycle and gear, the Mongol Ecology Center has agreed to pool it with the funds raised by other riders to fund another complete motorcycle.",1.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column5: >Everybody wants to live in healthy environment. We have a unique straw building technology. Your donation would help us develop efficient production and revolutionise the building industry.
column9:
> Be a part of this development!

Our modular straw panel elements have

column1: been a great success for the last 10 years - they provide an economic, healthy
and badly needed ecological solution for the construction industry. We believe
everybody has a right to live in a comfortable house that is beneficial to our
environment.
To achieve this we need to produce the
straw panels closer to you. But this is only possible if we can <b>engineer
more efficient production machinery! Only by heavily investing into the
development of a new generation of machinery can we increase production
efficiency by a factor of four, and take straw bale construction to the next
level.
Your support will make it possible to
develop highly efficient production machinery for local and regional
production. Your support has the potential to save tons of CO2 and primary
energy, both during construction and use of the building. You will not only be
helping us all, but make the World a better place at the same time.
How much CO2 can I save with my
support?
On average a straw panel house (140m2 wall surface) sequesters more than 10t of
CO2, even after including 500km road transport to the building site. And there
will be savings of approx. 50t of CO2 over the next 50 years by reducing the
energy needed for heating and/or cooling, compared even to a low energy house.
Our annual production of panels for 35
houses saves 350t of CO2 through sequestering, and another 1750t of CO2 during
the next 50 years. But we want our production to do better - with a possible
150 houses a year for each new and efficient production site, we will sequester
1500t of CO2 a year and achieve savings of 7500t of CO2 in the future.
If we had only 10 production sites
running for 10 years, the cumulated sequestered CO2 would amount to staggering
150'000t and the long term CO2 savings to another 750'000t.

What will we use your donations for?

We
hope to raise 450’000€ to cover all steps listed below. That means every € you
donate has the potential to save 2t of CO2!
To
move closer to our overall goal we split the process into few stages:
1. Development of a new,
efficient production line
For this stage we need
just 180’000€. This is our primary objective for this Indiegogo
project.
If we raise more funds, we
will continue with step 2 and 3:
2. Certification of
machinery so it can be sold in other countries
3. Help finance one or
more production lines in other countries
achieve less, we will be able to reach these goals, it will just take us a bit
longer. And we strongly believe the World cannot afford to wait!
We
need your help to develop our production technology and start a new production
line. We hope that you like our way of saving energy and creating ways of
saving the environment. Read about the details below and on our website www.ecococon.eu

and we will be happy to answer all your questions.

Need any additional reasons why you should donate? Here they are:
1.  Please donate if you think the construction business needs an alternative!
Straw panels provide an economic, healthy and
badly needed ecological solution for the construction industry. <span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
column2: >It is responsible for nearly 40% of worldwide CO2 emissions

column1: for construction, heating and cooling. This is completely wasteful – with today’s
technologies and available natural materials, this can easily be lowered to

column4: >Please donate if you want to have a positive impact on how people live!

column1: We believe everybody has a right to live in a
comfortable house that is beneficial to our environment. <span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
column2: >Many pay very high prices for very

column1: low quality buildings – straw panel houses provide high thermal comfort in
summer and winter, without compromising our environment.
3.
Please donate if you think independence of fossil fuels make the World a safer place to be!

column2: >Straw, wood and clay are abundant all over the World –

column1: by applying these in an efficient way we can lower the dependency from fossil
fuels and make the World a much safer place to be.
4.  Please donate if you want straw bale building to go mainstream!.
In France large 7 story
appartments and schools are built with straw as insulation. No wonder:  Straw panels are earthquake safe,  provide good insulation and achieve 120min
fire protection when plastered with clay.
5.
Please donate if you think earthquake safe buildings should not only be made from concrete!
In the earthquake zones, straw houses have an
advantage - flexibility of construction. <span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
than the calculated loads on the wooden construction. Compressed straw is load
bearing and flexible, providing exceptional security in earthquake zones.
6.
Please donate if you want to take the passivhaus standard one step further!
in the process of acquiring Passivhaus certification. By
easily achieve Passivehouse Standard with natural materials.
7.

Ecococon straw panels were listed as one of the

the 10 finalists in the Cradle to Cradle Innovation Challenge, clearly

9. Please donate if you want a system that provides creative freedom to the architect!
No limits to the design!
using different sized panels, produced on demand. The architect has complete

10.  Please donate if you are concerned about your health!
Live in a healthy home! Straw panels with clay plaster let people create a healthy and ecological interior. There is nothing more important than our health. Today
buildings might include more than 50000 substances, many of which have never
been checked for toxicity.
Estimated
development time
Chosen
flexible funding lets us implement different stages of our technology
development, depending on how much money we can raise:
•
If with your help we raise 180
000 € - we will be able to create functional prototypes of the new
machines. This will help develop and expand our production technology.
Planned time: 12 - 16 months after the end of the campaign.
•
If with your help we raise more - we will
be able to move to the next
stages and reach our overall goal faster.
If less money than hoped is raised, we will still invest all funds
raised into partial machinery development and keep you posted about the
progress we have made.
Delivery
time of perks: estimated delivery time is up to 3 months after the end of
campaign. The delivery time can vary due to various conditions, but you will be
informed if there will be any changes. We will contact you to clarify all
issues about the delivery.
Upon
successful completion of the campaign, you can follow all updates here and on
our website www.ecococon.eu.
<div>
Ecococon
technology
Our
existing production technology demands a lot of manual work. The efficiency is
not high. The 13 highly motivated employees in production can annually produce
panels for up to 50 houses. Labor increases the price of the panel and the
production line is for the moment too inefficient to be used in countries with
higher wages. But if we want to save energy and build ecologically, a solution
must be found to produce more houses efficiently.
The
concept for the new technology line lets us produce panels for 150 houses per
year with just 8 people working. The production line would be fairly simple and
due to certified machinery, production could be spread to other countries. In
this way our healthy and beneficial product could spread to a place closer to
you and help create many new working facilities all over the world. This will
help to protect our environment in the long term.
The
technology would be fairly simple and would not require large investment. Low
energy consumption during production and the exclusive use of renewable
materials is a great start for a healthy and ecological product - a product
that saves energy and provides comfort to people. And most importantly, due to
widely available resources used in production – it can be
located anywhere.
Now
production is based in Lithuania and this is the only factory – but
this situation will be changed with your help. The new production lines will
provide new opportunities on the labor market and support a network of small
companies that care about the environment.
History
of straw houses
When people hear about straw houses they often remember the
fairy-tale about The Three Pigs. In the fairy-tale the ending was not so happy,
but in reality straw houses are strong and warm buildings. People have been
building straw houses since the 19th century. The oldest straw house in Europe
is in Montargis in France – built
in 1921. In the USA in Nebraska, the oldest straw building in the world is more
than 110 years old.
Straw building techniques have moved forward and it was proved that
straw houses are very warm and fire resistant. These kind of buildings could
easily compete with bricks houses and log houses and became a serious
alternative in traditional building industry. Even in the earthquake zones,
straw houses have an advantage – practice showed that during the earthquakes
in China and Pakistan straw houses were not destroyed because of the
flexibility of construction.
Ecococon straw panels
The Ecococon team has created a unique method for pressing straw
into a frame to produce straight, high quality panels.  The beginning was not easy at all, and only
after spending many years with research and trials a technology was developed
that lets us produce high quality straw panels.
The main goal was to create technology which could provide more
environmentally friendly houses. Our panels are from natural materials, no
chemical components are included. Straw is a building material that is
plentiful. By using renewable materials no harm is made to the environment. In
2013, during the participation in Cradle to Cradle competition, Ecococon straw
panels were listed as one of the top 10 most ecological and innovative building

products in the world <a href=""http://www.sustainablebrands.com/news_and_views/design_innovation/10-finalists-cradle-cradle-product-innovation-challenge-show-what%E2%80%99s"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" style=""font-family: 'Benton Sans', Helvetica, sans-serif
Ecococon is a modular building system which assembly is very quick
and precise – you can see the building process http://www.ecococon.lt/english/straw-panels/  With the provided numbered parts and
drawings, a middle sized house can be built in 2-3 days using just simple tools.
Panels are produced with very little embodied energy. Even more
important, its excellent U-value and heat retaining characteristics will save
energy for heating and cooling throughout the lifetime of the building. Your
savings will also reduce global warming emissions.
The thermal resistance of the straw panels are 0,056 W/mK with a
resulting overall U-value of 0,107 W/m<sup>2</sup>K (R=9.3), including the 60-
100mm wood fibre board on the outside.
The formidable insulation value of the wall can be sufficient to
achieve Passive house standard.The passive house Standard does not only
achieve low energy consumption, but increases the quality and durability of the
building. It ensures also a much higher living comfort.
Straw panels are being produced according to
each project individually. The uniqueness of the technology is the
implementation of any kind of house design, any project can be built with straw
panels. Panels can be individually produced with 40-120cm width and 40-300cm
height. Load bearing lintels, inclined tops and braced corners are also
possible without a change of materials. The thickness of 40cm is standard.
Straw panels let people create a healthy and
ecological atmosphere in their living area. For inside walls, clay plaster
creates a great microclimate.
new additional certificates in 2016!
With the support of
European Union structural funds (30 000 €,
50% of the overall project sum of 60 000 €), we will in October start
proceedings for Passive house, Cradle to Cradle and CE
certification. The certification
process should be completed
in June 2016.
These certificates
will provide trust for
our product, and provide additional traction for our quest to bring
ecological construction to the mainstream!
Features
•
Only renewable materials used
•
Created healthy living
environment and great microclimate inside the house
•
Any building design is possible
•
Very high fire resistance (clay
plaster on straw reaches 120min. fire protection!)
•
Perfect Sound insulation – absolutely
quiet inside
•
Straw panels are certified http://www.ecococon.lt/english/official-documents-certificates/
•
Easy to achieve a high energy
saving or passive house standard
•
From 2013 National technical
assessment No NTĮ-01-061:2013 http://www.ecococon.lt/english/official-documents-certificates/national-technical-approval/
•
One of top 10 most ecological
products in Cradle to Cradle competition in 2013 http://www.sustainablebrands.com/news_and_views/design_innovation/10-finalists-cradle-cradle-product-innovation-challenge-show-what’s
•
All the characteristics of the
panels: http://www.ecococon.lt/english/straw-panel-characteristics/
Thank
you!
We
would like to thank each backer for their contribution in helping us in this
project and develop what we feel is a needed product for the environment.
Please help us to share this project through any media sources you wish, we are
very grateful for your help!
If you have any questions or comments feel free to contact us at lina@ecococon.lt or marius@ecococon.lt

Visi
norime gyventi sveikoje aplinkoje. Mes sukūrėme unikalią šiaudų statybos
technologiją. Jūsų parama padės plėtoti gamybą ir sukelti revoliuciją statybos
pramonėje. Būkite šios plėtros dalimi!
Šiaudų skydai per pastaruosius 10 metų labai
išpopuliarėjo – jie įnešė ekonominį, sveiką ir labai reikalingą ekologišką
indėlį statybų pramonėje. Mes tikime, jog kiekvienas turi teisę gyventi
jaukiame name, kuris nesukelia žalos aplinkai.
Jūsų parama suteiks galimybę plėtoti efektyvios
gamybos įrenginius vietinei ir užsienio gamybai. Jūs ne tik padėsite mums,
tačiau ir padarysite pasaulį geresne ir švaresne vieta gyventi.
Kam
bus panaudota jūsų parama?
Mes tikimės surinkti 450’000€ įgyvendinti
žemiau pateiktiems žingsniams. Tai reiškia, kad kiekvienas €, kuriuo jūs
paremiate turi potencialą išsaugoti 2t CO2.
Norėdami priartėti prie pagrindinio tikslo, procesą
suskirstėme etapais:
1.  Naujos efektyvios gamybos linijos plėtojimas
Šiame etape reikalinga suma 180’000€. Tai
yra mūsų pagrindinis tikslas šiame Indiegogo projekte.
Jei
surinksime daugiau, plėtosime 2 ir 3 etapus:
2.  Įrangos
sertifikavimas, kad galima būtų ją realizuoti kitose šalyse.
3.  Padėti
finansuoti vieną ar kelias gamybos linijas kitose šalyse.
Jei
mes pasieksime mažiau, galėsime pradėti įgyvendinti savo tikslus, tik tai užims
daugiau laiko.
Mums reikalinga jūsų pagalba išvystyti gamybos
technologijai ir pradėti naują gamybinę liniją. Skaitykite plačiau žemiau bei
mūsų internetinėje svetainėje www.ecococon.lt kilus klausimams mielai į
juos atsakysime.
Daugiau priežasčių mus paremti:
Jei manote, kad statybų
sektoriuje reikalinga alternatyva.
Šiaudų skydai įnešė ekonominį, sveiką ir labai
reikalingą ekologinį indėlį statybų sektoriuje. Žvelgiant pasauliniu
mąstu statybų pramonė yra atsakinga už beveik 40% CO2 išskyrimą pačių statybų
metu bei šildant ir vėdinant pastatus. Su šiuolaikinėmis technologijomis ir prieinamomis
natūraliomis medžiagomis ši tarša gali būti ženkliai sumažinta.
2.  Jei
norite padaryti teigiamą poveikį žmonių gyvenimo kokybei.
Mes tikime, kad
kiekvienas turi teisę gyventi jaukiame name, kuris neturi neigiamo poveikio
aplinkai.Daugelis
moka didelę kainą už labai žemą pastatų kokybę – šiaudų skydų namai suteikia
aukšto lygio komfortą tiek vasarą, tiek žiemą be žalos aplinkai.
3.
Jei manote, kad šiaudiniai namai turi plisti.
Prancūzijoje didelis 7 aukštų pastatas bei mokyklos yra statomos
naudojant šiaudus kaip apšiltinamąją medžiagą. Nieko keisto: šiaudų skydai yra
atsparūs žemės drebėjimams, pasižymi gera šilumos izoliacija bei siekia 120
minučių gaisro atsparumą jei yra nutinkuoti molio tinku.
4.  Jei manote, kad atsparūs žemės drebėjimams
namai turi būti statomi ne tik iš betono.
Zonose, kuriose gausu žemės drebėjimų, šiaudiniai namai turi privalumą –
konstrukcijos lankstumą. Šiaudų skydai atlaiko didesnes apkrovas nei
apskaičiuotos medinių konstrukcijų apkrovos. Suspausti šiaudų skydai yra
laikančioji ir tuo pačiu lanksti konstrukcija, suteikianti išskirtinį saugumą
žemės drebėjimų zonose.
5.  Jei manote, kad pasyvūs namai turi būti iš natūralių
medžiagų.
2016 metais planuojamas Ecococon sienų sistemos sertifikavimas Pasyvaus
namo sertifikatu. Architektai lengvai gali pasiekti pasyvaus namo standartą
naudodami natūralias medžiagas.
6.  Jei manote, kad ekologiškumas svarbu.
Ecococon šiaudų skydai pateko į top 10 ekologiškiausių ir inovatyviausių
produktų visame pasaulyje. Ecococon skydai pateko tarp 10 finalistų Cradle to
Cradle inovacijų konkurse. 2016 metais tikimės pasiekti Cradle to Cradle
sertifikavimą, kas pagrįs produkto ekologiškumą.
7.  Jei manote, kad ekonomiškai efektyvi statyba
yra svarbi.
Ecococon yra modulinė statybos sistema, kurios surinkimas yra greitas ir
tikslus. Ar įmanoma pastatyti 400 m2 namą per tris dienas? Tai padarė Šveicarai
su 318 m2 Ecococon šiaudų skydų. Konstrukcijos dėka, statybos yra produktyvios
ir ekonomiškai efektyvios – ypač šalyse su brangia darbo jėga.
8.  Jei manote, kad architektūrinė laisvė
svarbi.
Jokių dizaino apribojimų! Visų tipų dizainai gali būti įgyvendinti
naudojant skirtingo dydžio skydus pagamintus pagal individualų projektą.
Architektai turi visišką laisvę projektavimui.
9.  Jei jums rūpi jūsų sveikata.
Gyvenkite
sveikuose namuose. Šiaudų skydai su molio tinku leidžia sukurti sveiką ir
ekologišką vidaus dizainą. Nėra nieko svarbiau nei mūsų sveikata. Šiandieninė
statyba gali turėti iki 50000 medžiagų, kurių didžioji dalis net nebuvo tirta
dėl toksinų.
(IT)
Costruire con pannelli di
paglia!
Ogni euro donato salva 2
tonnellate di CO2. Contribuisci a rivoluzionare l’edilizia!
In media una casa
costruita con pannelli di paglia (circa 140 mq di superficie muro) incamera più
di 10 tonnellate di CO2, anche dopo aver effettuato 500 km di trasporto su
strada verso il cantiere.
Inoltre ci sarà un
risparmio di circa 50 t di CO2 nei prossimi 50 anni, riducendo l’energia
necessaria per il riscaldamento e raffrescamento.
Se vi interessa ridurre le
emissioni di CO2, siete pregati di donare!!
Tutti vogliono vivere in un ambiente sano. Abbiamo una
tecnologia costruttiva unica utillizzando la paglia. La tua donazione aiuterebbe
a sviluppare una produzione efficiente rivoluzionando l'industria edilizia. Fai
parte di questo sviluppo!
I nostri elementi di paglia modulari sono stati un grande successo negli ultimi
10 anni, forniscono una soluzione ecologica economica, sana e assolutamente
necessaria per l'industria delle costruzioni. Crediamo che tutti hanno il
diritto di vivere in una casa confortevole con il beneficio per il nostro
ambiente.
Per raggiungere questo obiettivo abbiamo bisogno di produrre pannelli di paglia
più vicino a noi. Tutto questo è possibile solo se progettiamo macchinari di
produzione più efficienti!
Solo investendo pesantemente nello sviluppo di una nuova
generazione di macchine possiamo aumentare l'efficienza della produzione.
Con il vostro supporto si potranno sviluppare macchine di produzione ad alta
efficienza per la produzione locale e regionale. Un enorme potenziale per
salvare tonnellate di CO2 e di energia primaria, sia in fase di costruzione e
durante l'utilizzo dell'edificio. Non sarà solo per aiutare tutti noi, ma
rendere il mondo un posto migliore.
Quanta CO2 posso risparmiare con il mio supporto?
La produzione annuale di pannelli per 35 case consente di risparmiare 350t di
CO2, e altre  1750t di CO2 nel corso dei
prossimi 50 anni. Ma noi vogliamo fare meglio - con 150 case all'anno per ogni
nuovo ed efficiente sito produttivo, saranno risparmiate 1500t di CO2 all'anno
e otterremmo un risparmio di 7500t di CO2 nel futuro.
Se avessimo solo 10 siti produttivi in ​​esecuzione per 10 anni, la CO2
cumulato sarebbe pari a 150'000t  (sconcertante!)
e il risparmio di CO2 a lungo termine ad altre 750'000t.
Come utilizzeremo le vostre donazioni ?
Speriamo di raccogliere € 450'000  per
coprire tutti i passaggi elencati di seguito. Ciò significa che ogni € donato
ha il potenziale di salvare 2t di CO2!
Per avvicinarsi al nostro obiettivo generale abbiamo diviso il processo in alcune
fasi:
1. Sviluppo di una nuova, efficiente linea di produzione
Per questa fase abbiamo bisogno solo € 180'000. Questo è il nostro obiettivo
primario per questo progetto chiamato Indiegogo.
Se riceveremo più fondi, continueremo con la fase 2 e 3:
2. La certificazione delle macchine in modo che possa essere venduto in altri
paesi
3. contribuire a finanziare una o più linee di produzione in altri paesi
Anche se otteniamo meno, saremo in grado di raggiungere questi obiettivi, solo
ci vorrà un po’ più di tempo. E crediamo fortemente che il mondo non può più
permettersi di aspettare!
Abbiamo bisogno del vostro aiuto per sviluppare la nostra tecnologia di
produzione e iniziare una nuova linea di produzione. Ci auguriamo che ti
soddisfi il nostro pensiero di risparmio energetico e la creazione di modi di
salvare l'ambiente. Leggi i dettagli di seguito e sul nostro sito web
www.ecococon.eu e saremo lieti di rispondere a tutte le vostre domande.
Hai bisogno di eventuali ulteriori motivi  per donare? Eccoli:
1. Si prega di donare se si pensa che il settore delle costruzioni abbia
bisogno di un alternativa!
I pannelli di paglia offrono una soluzione ecologica economica, sana e
assolutamente necessaria per l'industria delle costruzioni. E’ responsabile di
quasi il 40% delle emissioni di CO2 a livello mondiale per la costruzione, il
riscaldamento e il raffreddamento. Questo è davvero uno spreco! Con le
tecnologie odierne e i materiali naturali disponibili, questo spreco può
facilmente essere abbassato a livelli sostenibili!
2. Si prega di donare se si vuole avere un impatto positivo sul benessere delle
persone!
Crediamo che tutti hanno il diritto di vivere in una casa confortevole che è
anche beneficio per il nostro ambiente. Molti pagano prezzi molto elevati per
gli edifici di qualità molto bassa - le case prefabbricate di paglia offrono un
elevato comfort termico in estate e in inverno, senza compromettere il nostro
ambiente.
3. Si prega di donare se si pensa all'indipendenza dei combustibili fossili,  a rendere il mondo un posto più sicuro per vivere!
Paglia, legno e argilla sono abbondanti in tutto il mondo -, applicando questi materiali
in modo efficiente possiamo abbassare la dipendenza dai combustibili fossili e
rendere il mondo un posto più sicuro dove stare.
4. Si prega di donare se volete la paglia nella costruzione ed andare contro corrente!
In Francia appartamenti e scuole sono costruite con  il materiale isolante in paglia. Non c'è da
stupirsi: i pannelli di paglia sono sicuri contro il terremoto, offrono un buon
isolamento e raggiungono la protezione antincendio di 120min quando sono
intonacati con argilla.
5. Si prega di donare se si pensa che gli edifici sicuri non devono essere
fatti solo da cemento!
Nelle zone terremotate, le case di paglia hanno un vantaggio - la flessibilità
di costruzione. La paglia compressa è portante e flessibile, fornendo sicurezza
eccezionale in zone sismiche.
6. Si prega di donare se si vuole fare un passo avanti con lo standard
Passivhaus!
Il sistema a parete Ecococon è in procinto di ottenere la certificazione
Passivhaus. Con l'implementazione di particolari esistenti, gli architetti
possono facilmente raggiungere lo standard passivo utilizzando materiali
naturali.
7. Si prega di donare se sei un fan del Cradle to Cradle concept!
I pannelli di paglia Ecococon sono stati indicati come uno dei top 10 tra la maggior
parte dei prodotti da costruzione ecologici e innovativi al mondo. I pannelli
Ecococon sono tra i 10 finalisti del Cradle to Cradle Innovation Challenge,
dimostrando chiaramente il potenziale ecologico del prodotto. Speriamo di
ottenere la certificazione completa Cradle entro il prossimo anno.
Inizio modulo
8. Si prega di donare se si pensa che i
costi efficienti di costruzione siano importanti!
Ecococon è un sistema di costruzione modulare a montaggio molto veloce e
preciso. Costruire una casa di 400m2 in tre giorni? Questo è ciò che ha fatto
la Svizzera con 318m2 di pannelli Ecococon. Grazie al nostro concetto, la costruzione
è efficiente ed economica - specialmente in paesi con alti costi del lavoro.
9. Si prega di donare se si vuole un sistema che prevede la libertà creativa dell'architetto!
Nessun limite al design! Tutto il disegno può essere assemblato con pannelli di
dimensioni diverse, prodotte su richiesta. L'architetto ha piena libertà di
progettazione.
10. Si prega di donare se siete preoccupati per la vostra salute!
Vivere in una casa sana! I pannelli di paglia con intonaco di argilla
permettono alle persone di creare un interno sano ed ecologico. Non c'è nulla
di più importante della nostra salute. Gi attuali edifici potrebbero includere
più di 50.000 sostanze, molte delle quali non sono mai state controllate per la
tossicità.
I tempi di sviluppo stimato
Attraverso un finanziamento flessibile ci permette di implementare diversi
stadi del nostro sviluppo tecnologico, a seconda di quanto denaro si può ricavare:
• Se con il vostro aiuto raggiungiamo € 180 000 , saremo in grado di creare
prototipi funzionali delle nuove macchine. Ciò contribuirà a sviluppare ed
espandere la nostra tecnologia di produzione.
Tempo previsto: 12 - 16 mesi dopo la fine della campagna.
• Se con il vostro aiuto raggiungiamo una cifra maggiore,  saremo in grado di muoverci per le prossime
tappe e raggiungere il nostro obiettivo generale più velocemente.
Se raccogliamo meno denaro di quanto sperato, investiremo  tutti i fondi raccolti in sviluppo macchinari
parziale e Vi terremo sempre aggiornati sui progressi.
Termine di consegna di vantaggi: tempo stimato di consegna è fino a 3 mesi dopo
la fine della campagna. Il termine di consegna può variare a causa di varie
condizioni, ma sarete informati se ci saranno cambiamenti. Ci metteremo in
contatto per chiarire tutte le questioni circa la consegna.
In caso di superamento della campagna, è possibile seguire tutti gli
aggiornamenti qui,  e sul nostro sito www.ecococon.eu.
La tecnologia Ecococon
La nostra tecnologia di produzione attuale richiede un sacco di lavoro manuale.
L'efficienza non è elevata. I 13 collaboratori altamente motivati ​​nella
produzione possono produrre annualmente pannelli per un massimo di 50 case. La
manodopera aumenta il prezzo del pannello e la linea di produzione è per il
momento troppo inefficiente per essere utilizzata in paesi con salari più alti.
Ma se vogliamo risparmiare energia e costruire ecologicamente, una soluzione
deve essere trovata per produrre più case in modo efficiente.
Il concept per la nuova linea di produzione ci consente di produrre pannelli
per 150 case all'anno, con soli 8 persone che lavorano. La linea di produzione
dovrebbe essere abbastanza semplice e, grazie alle macchine certificate, la produzione
potrebbe essere diffusa ad altri paesi. In questo modo il nostro prodotto sano
e benefico potrebbe diffondersi in un posto più vicino a te e contribuire a
creare molte nuove strutture di lavoro in tutto il mondo. Questo aiuterà a
proteggere il nostro ambiente a lungo termine.
Basso consumo di energia durante la produzione e l'uso esclusivo di materiali
rinnovabili è un grande inizio per un prodotto sano ed ecologico, un prodotto
che permette di risparmiare energia e offre comfort per le persone. E,
soprattutto, a causa delle risorse ampiamente disponibili utilizzate nella
produzione, può essere posizionato ovunque.
Ora la produzione è basata in Lituania e questa è l'unica fabbrica,  ma questa situazione sarà modificata con il vostro
aiuto. Le nuove linee di produzione forniranno nuove opportunità sul mercato
del lavoro e sosteranno una rete di piccole imprese che si preoccupano per
l'ambiente.
Storia di case di paglia
Quando le persone sentono parlare di case di paglia, ricordano spesso la fiaba dei
I Tre Porcellini. Nella fiaba il finale non era così felice, ma in realtà le case
di paglia sono edifici forti e caldi. Le persone hanno costruito case di paglia
dal 19 ° secolo. La più antica casa di paglia in Europa è a Montargis in
Francia - costruita nel 1921. Negli Stati Uniti nel Nebraska, l'edificio più
antico di paglia nel mondo ha più di 110 anni.
Le tecniche di costruzione di paglia si sono spostate in avanti e si è
dimostrato che le case di paglia sono molto calde e resistenti al fuoco. Questo
tipo di edifici potrebbe facilmente competere con case di mattoni
alternativa all’edilizia tradizionale. Anche nelle zone sismiche, le case di
paglia hanno un vantaggio
column2: è emerso che durante i terremoti in Cina e Pakistan le

column1: case di paglia non sono state distrutte a causa della loro flessibilità di
costruzione.
Pannelli di paglia Ecococon
Il team Ecococon ha creato un metodo unico per la pressatura di paglia in una
cornice per pannelli di altissima qualità. L'inizio non è stato facile, e solo
dopo aver trascorso molti anni con ricerche e sperimentazioni,  è stata sviluppata una tecnologia che ci
permette di produrre pannelli di paglia di alta qualità.
L'obiettivo principale era quello di creare una tecnologia che potrebbe fornire
più case ecocompatibili. I nostri pannelli sono materiali naturali, non
contengono componenti chimici. La paglia è un materiale da costruzione che è
abbondante. Utilizzando materiali rinnovabili nessun danno è fatto per
l'ambiente. Nel 2013, durante la partecipazione al concorso  Cradle to Cradle i pannelli di paglia Ecococon
sono stati indicati tra i  migliori 10
prodotti da costruzione ecologici e innovativi del mondo
http://www.sustainablebrands.com/news_and_views/design_innovation/10-finalists-cradle-cradle-product-innovation-challenge-show-what’s
Ecococon è un sistema di costruzione modulare, il montaggio è molto veloce e
preciso - si può vedere il processo di costruzione http://www.ecococon.lt/english/straw-panels/
Con le particolari e i
disegni forniti, una casa di medie dimensioni può essere costruita in 2-3
giorni utilizzando strumenti molto semplici.
I pannelli sono prodotti con pochissima energia incorporata. Ancora più
importante, le eccellenti caratteristiche di U-valore , trattenere il calore
farà risparmiare energia per il riscaldamento e il raffrescamento per tutta la
durata della costruzione. Contribuiremo a ridurre il riscaldamento globale.
La resistenza termica dei pannelli di paglia sono 0,056 W / mK con un
conseguente valore U di 0,107 W / m2K generale (<span>R = 9.3), compreso un
pannello di fibra di legno 60-
100 millimetri all'esterno.
Il valore di isolamento formidabile del muro può
essere sufficiente per raggiungere
casa passiva standard.
La casa passiva standard non si vuole raggiungere
per il  solo basso consumo energetico, ma aumentare la qualità e la durata della costruzione. Garantisce inoltre un più elevato comfort
abitativo.
I pannelli di paglia vengono prodotti in base ad ogni singola progettazione. L'unicità della
tecnologia è la realizzazione di qualsiasi tipo di casa di design, ogni progetto può essere
costruito con pannelli di paglia.
I pannelli possono essere prodotti
individualmente con la larghezza e l'altezza 40-300cm 40-120cm.
Caricare architravi portanti, piani inclinati e angoli sono possibili
senza il cambiamento del materiale.
Lo spessore di 40 cm è di serie.
I pannelli di paglia permettono alle persone di creare un ambiente
sano ed ecologico nel loro
salotto. Per le pareti interne, utilizzando intonaco di argilla
si crea una piacevole microclima.
3 nuovi certificati supplementari nel
Con il sostegno dei fondi strutturali dell'Unione europea (30 000 €, il 50%
della somma complessiva) ci sarà nel mese di ottobre l’avvio di una procedura
per casa passiva, Cradle to Cradle e certificazione CE. Il processo di
certificazione dovrebbe essere completata nel giugno 2016.
Questi certificati forniranno ulteriore fiducia al nostro prodotto, e forniranno
ulteriori attenzioni  per la nostra
ricerca per portare la costruzione ecologica all’estremo.

Bouw met stropanelen!
Help de revolutie in de bouw! Elke gedoneerde €uro bespaart 2 ton CO2.
Gemiddeld bespaart een huis gebouwd van stropanelen (140m2 wandoppelvlak)
meer dan 10 ton CO2, zelfs als hiervoor 500km transport naar de bouwplaats
wordt meegerekend.. Daarnaast levert datzelfde huis de komende 50 jaar, door
zijn extreem lage energievraag voor verwarming en koeling nog eens een
besparing van 50 ton CO2, zelfs vergeleken met een goed geisoleerd huis.
Ø
Draag bij omdat je het verlagen van de CO2-uitstoot
belangrijk vindt!
Duurzame innovatie in de bouw
is broodnodig. Stropanelenbouw zorgt voor een ommekeer!
De bouwgerelateerde industrie is verantwoordelijk voor bijna 40% van de
wereldwijde CO2 emissie. Het gaat dan om gebouwverwarming- en koeling en de
bouwindustrie zelf.
Met de techniek van vandaag en met beschikbare natuurlijke materialen kan
deze verspilling makkelijk gereduceerd worden tot een duurzaam aanvaardbaar
niveau.
Ø
Draag bij als je vindt dat de bouw verduurzaamd moet worden!
Tijd voor verandering!
We geloven dat een ieder het recht heeft op een comfortabel onderdak dat
bijdraagt aan het milieu.
Er wordt erg veel geld betaald voor gebouwen met een gebrekkig
kwaliteitsniveau. Stropaneel bouw zorgt voor een natuurlijk binnnenklimaat, met
zeer hoge warmte en koude-isolatie, zonder het klimaat geweld aan te doen bij
de productie.
Ø
Draag bij als je ook denkt dat verandering nodig is!
Draag bij aan grootschalige
besparing van fossiele brandstof en CO2-uitstoot.
Stro, hout en leem zijn over de hele wereld
ruim voor handen. Door deze materialen efficiënt in te zetten kunnen we de
afhankelijkheid van fossiele brandstoffen en CO2-uitstoot belangrijk verlagen.
Ø  Draag bij als je ook gelooft dat onafhankelijkheid van fossiele
brandstof voor een betere wereld zorgt !
Revolutie
in de bouw!
Bouwen met stropanelen begint een serieus
alternatief te vormen voor traditioneel bouwen.
In Frankrijk worden al 7-hoge gebouwen en
scholen gebouwd met stro als isolatie. Dat is op zich  niet vreemd: stropanelen-bouw is
aardbeving-proof, zijn 120 minuten brandwerend, geven een optimale isolatie en
een fantastisch binnenklimaat (mits afgewerkt met leem)
Ø  Draag bij als je voorstander bent van een duurzame revolutie in de
bouw.
Bouw
aardbeving-proof !
Stropanelen-bouw is zeer schokbestendig.
Vanwege de opbouw uit houten delen en het feit dat de geperste stro
constructief en toch flexibel is, geeft het een uitstekende
aardbevingsbestendigheid.
Voor de aardgaswinningsgbieden in
Noord-Nederland zou het ideaal zijn als de schade van de aardgasindustrie
herstelt wordt met natuurlijke bouwmaterialen .
Ø  Draag bij als je ook vindt dat je geen beton moet terugbouwen in
aardbevingsregio’s
Makkelijk
een passief-huis bouwen met natuurlijke materialen!
Het Ecococon wandsysteem is bezig met
Passiefhuis-certificering. Daarmee wordt een passief huis niet alleen duurzaam
in energieverbruik maar ook in bouwmateriaal.
Ø  Draag bij als je vindt dat een passiefhuis van natuurlijke
bouwmaterialen een beter passief huis is!
Het
meest ecologische product in de wereld?
Ecococon
was met haar stropanelen een van de 10 finalisten in the
Cradle-to-cradle Innovation Challenge. Komend jaar wordt een volledig
Cradle-to-cradle certificaat verwacht.
Ø  Draag bij als je fan bent van het Cradle-to cradle concept.
Bouw
een huis in 1 dag !
Ecococon is een modulair bouwsysteem
waarmee zeer snel en precies gebouwd wordt.
Een huis van 400m2 bouwen in 3 dagen? Dat
deden ze in Zwitserland met 318m2 stropaneel van Ecococon. Met deze bouwmethode
kan efficiënt en kosten-effectief gebouwd worden
arbeidskosten.
Ø  Draag bij als je gelooft in snel en effectief bouwen.
Geen
beperking aan het ontwerp !
Het unieke van het bouwsysteem is dat het
geen beperkingen stelt aan het ontwerp. Elk project kan er mee gebouwd worden.
Het wordt samengesteld uit verschillende op aanvraag  geprefabriceerde “bouwstenen“. De architect
heeft volledige ontwerpvrijheid.
Ø  Draag bij als je gelooft in een bouwsysteem dat creatieve vrijheid aan
de architect biedt.
Leef
in een gezond huis !
Stropanelen afgewerkt met leem zorgen voor
een gezond binnenklimaat. In tegenstelling tot de traditionele bouw is bouwen
met stropanelen volledig cradle-to-cradle. In de wetenschap dat in traditionele
bouw zo’n 50.000 stoffen verwerkt worden, waarvan vele nooit op schadelijkheid
in het binnenklimaat getest zijn, is natuurlijk bouwen alleen al zeer de moeite
waard.
Ø  Draag bij als je gelooft in een gezond en natuurlijk binnenklimaat.

","Everybody wants to live in healthy environment. We have a unique straw building technology. Your donation would help us develop efficient production and revolutionise the building industry. Be a part of this development!Our modular straw panel elements have
been a great success for the last 10 years - they provide an economic, healthy
and badly needed ecological solution for the construction industry. We believe
everybody has a right to live in a comfortable house that is beneficial to our
environment.
To achieve this we need to produce the
straw panels closer to you. But this is only possible if we can engineer
more efficient production machinery! Only by heavily investing into the
development of a new generation of machinery can we increase production
efficiency by a factor of four, and take straw bale construction to the next
level.
Your support will make it possible to
develop highly efficient production machinery for local and regional
production. Your support has the potential to save tons of CO2 and primary
energy, both during construction and use of the building. You will not only be
helping us all, but make the World a better place at the same time.
How much CO2 can I save with my
support?
On average a straw panel house (140m2 wall surface) sequesters more than 10t of
CO2, even after including 500km road transport to the building site. And there
will be savings of approx. 50t of CO2 over the next 50 years by reducing the
energy needed for heating and/or cooling, compared even to a low energy house.
Our annual production of panels for 35
houses saves 350t of CO2 through sequestering, and another 1750t of CO2 during
the next 50 years. But we want our production to do better - with a possible
150 houses a year for each new and efficient production site, we will sequester
1500t of CO2 a year and achieve savings of 7500t of CO2 in the future.
If we had only 10 production sites
running for 10 years, the cumulated sequestered CO2 would amount to staggering
150'000t and the long term CO2 savings to another 750'000t.
What will we use your donations for?We
hope to raise 450’000€ to cover all steps listed below. That means every € you
donate has the potential to save 2t of CO2!
To
move closer to our overall goal we split the process into few stages:
1. Development of a new,
efficient production line
For this stage we need
just 180’000€. This is our primary objective for this Indiegogo
project.
If we raise more funds, we
will continue with step 2 and 3:
2. Certification of
machinery so it can be sold in other countries
3. Help finance one or
more production lines in other countriesEven if we
achieve less, we will be able to reach these goals, it will just take us a bit
longer. And we strongly believe the World cannot afford to wait!
We
need your help to develop our production technology and start a new production
line. We hope that you like our way of saving energy and creating ways of
saving the environment. Read about the details below and on our website www.ecococon.eu
and we will be happy to answer all your questions.Need any additional reasons why you should donate? Here they are:
1.  Please donate if you think the construction business needs an alternative!
Straw panels provide an economic, healthy and
badly needed ecological solution for the construction industry. It is responsible for nearly 40% of worldwide CO2 emissions
for construction, heating and cooling. This is completely wasteful – with today’s
technologies and available natural materials, this can easily be lowered to
sustainable levels!
2. Please donate if you want to have a positive impact on how people live!
We believe everybody has a right to live in a
comfortable house that is beneficial to our environment. Many pay very high prices for very
low quality buildings – straw panel houses provide high thermal comfort in
summer and winter, without compromising our environment.
Please donate if you think independence of fossil fuels make the World a safer place to be!
Straw, wood and clay are abundant all over the World –
by applying these in an efficient way we can lower the dependency from fossil
fuels and make the World a much safer place to be.
4.  Please donate if you want straw bale building to go mainstream!.
In France large 7 story
appartments and schools are built with straw as insulation. No wonder:  Straw panels are earthquake safe,  provide good insulation and achieve 120min
fire protection when plastered with clay.
Please donate if you think earthquake safe buildings should not only be made from concrete!
In the earthquake zones, straw houses have an
advantage - flexibility of construction. Straw panels can take more
than the calculated loads on the wooden construction. Compressed straw is load
bearing and flexible, providing exceptional security in earthquake zones.
Please donate if you want to take the passivhaus standard one step further!
The Ecococon wall system is

Ecococon
technology
Our
existing production technology demands a lot of manual work. The efficiency is
not high. The 13 highly motivated employees in production can annually produce
panels for up to 50 houses. Labor increases the price of the panel and the
production line is for the moment too inefficient to be used in countries with
higher wages. But if we want to save energy and build ecologically, a solution
must be found to produce more houses efficiently.
The
concept for the new technology line lets us produce panels for 150 houses per
year with just 8 people working. The production line would be fairly simple and
due to certified machinery, production could be spread to other countries. In
this way our healthy and beneficial product could spread to a place closer to
you and help create many new working facilities all over the world. This will
help to protect our environment in the long term.
The
technology would be fairly simple and would not require large investment. Low
energy consumption during production and the exclusive use of renewable
materials is a great start for a healthy and ecological product - a product
that saves energy and provides comfort to people. And most importantly, due to
widely available resources used in production – it can be
located anywhere.
Now
production is based in Lithuania and this is the only factory – but
this situation will be changed with your help. The new production lines will
provide new opportunities on the labor market and support a network of small
companies that care about the environment.
History
of straw houses
When people hear about straw houses they often remember the
fairy-tale about The Three Pigs. In the fairy-tale the ending was not so happy,
but in reality straw houses are strong and warm buildings. People have been
building straw houses since the 19th century. The oldest straw house in Europe
is in Montargis in France – built
in 1921. In the USA in Nebraska, the oldest straw building in the world is more
than 110 years old.
Straw building techniques have moved forward and it was proved that
straw houses are very warm and fire resistant. These kind of buildings could
easily compete with bricks houses and log houses and became a serious
alternative in traditional building industry. Even in the earthquake zones,
straw houses have an advantage – practice showed that during the earthquakes
in China and Pakistan straw houses were not destroyed because of the
flexibility of construction.
Ecococon straw panels
The Ecococon team has created a unique method for pressing straw
into a frame to produce straight, high quality panels.  The beginning was not easy at all, and only
after spending many years with research and trials a technology was developed
that lets us produce high quality straw panels.
The main goal was to create technology which could provide more
environmentally friendly houses. Our panels are from natural materials, no
chemical components are included. Straw is a building material that is
plentiful. By using renewable materials no harm is made to the environment. In
2013, during the participation in Cradle to Cradle competition, Ecococon straw
panels were listed as one of the top 10 most ecological and innovative building
products in the world http://www.sustainablebrands.com/news_and_views/design_innovation/10-finalists-cradle-cradle-product-innovation-challenge-show-what’s
Ecococon is a modular building system which assembly is very quick
and precise – you can see the building process http://www.ecococon.lt/english/straw-panels/  With the provided numbered parts and
drawings, a middle sized house can be built in 2-3 days using just simple tools.
Panels are produced with very little embodied energy. Even more
important, its excellent U-value and heat retaining characteristics will save
energy for heating and cooling throughout the lifetime of the building. Your
savings will also reduce global warming emissions.
The thermal resistance of the straw panels are 0,056 W/mK with a
resulting overall U-value of 0,107 W/m2K (R=9.3), including the 60-
100mm wood fibre board on the outside.
The formidable insulation value of the wall can be sufficient to
achieve Passive house standard.The passive house Standard does not only
achieve low energy consumption, but increases the quality and durability of the
building. It ensures also a much higher living comfort.
Straw panels are being produced according to
each project individually. The uniqueness of the technology is the
implementation of any kind of house design, any project can be built with straw
panels. Panels can be individually produced with 40-120cm width and 40-300cm
height. Load bearing lintels, inclined tops and braced corners are also
possible without a change of materials. The thickness of 40cm is standard.
Straw panels let people create a healthy and
ecological atmosphere in their living area. For inside walls, clay plaster
creates a great microclimate.

Visi
norime gyventi sveikoje aplinkoje. Mes sukūrėme unikalią šiaudų statybos
technologiją. Jūsų parama padės plėtoti gamybą ir sukelti revoliuciją statybos
pramonėje. Būkite šios plėtros dalimi!
Šiaudų skydai per pastaruosius 10 metų labai
išpopuliarėjo – jie įnešė ekonominį, sveiką ir labai reikalingą ekologišką
indėlį statybų pramonėje. Mes tikime, jog kiekvienas turi teisę gyventi
jaukiame name, kuris nesukelia žalos aplinkai.
Jūsų parama suteiks galimybę plėtoti efektyvios
gamybos įrenginius vietinei ir užsienio gamybai. Jūs ne tik padėsite mums,
tačiau ir padarysite pasaulį geresne ir švaresne vieta gyventi.
Kam
bus panaudota jūsų parama?
Mes tikimės surinkti 450’000€ įgyvendinti
žemiau pateiktiems žingsniams. Tai reiškia, kad kiekvienas €, kuriuo jūs
paremiate turi potencialą išsaugoti 2t CO2.
Norėdami priartėti prie pagrindinio tikslo, procesą
suskirstėme etapais:
1.  Naujos efektyvios gamybos linijos plėtojimas
Šiame etape reikalinga suma 180’000€. Tai
yra mūsų pagrindinis tikslas šiame Indiegogo projekte.
Jei
surinksime daugiau, plėtosime 2 ir 3 etapus:
2.  Įrangos
sertifikavimas, kad galima būtų ją realizuoti kitose šalyse.
3.  Padėti
finansuoti vieną ar kelias gamybos linijas kitose šalyse.
Jei
mes pasieksime mažiau, galėsime pradėti įgyvendinti savo tikslus, tik tai užims
daugiau laiko.
Mums reikalinga jūsų pagalba išvystyti gamybos
technologijai ir pradėti naują gamybinę liniją. Skaitykite plačiau žemiau bei
mūsų internetinėje svetainėje www.ecococon.lt kilus klausimams mielai į
juos atsakysime.
Daugiau priežasčių mus paremti:
Jei manote, kad statybų
sektoriuje reikalinga alternatyva.
Šiaudų skydai įnešė ekonominį, sveiką ir labai
reikalingą ekologinį indėlį statybų sektoriuje. Žvelgiant pasauliniu
mąstu statybų pramonė yra atsakinga už beveik 40% CO2 išskyrimą pačių statybų
metu bei šildant ir vėdinant pastatus. Su šiuolaikinėmis technologijomis ir prieinamomis
natūraliomis medžiagomis ši tarša gali būti ženkliai sumažinta.
2.  Jei
norite padaryti teigiamą poveikį žmonių gyvenimo kokybei.
Mes tikime, kad
kiekvienas turi teisę gyventi jaukiame name, kuris neturi neigiamo poveikio
aplinkai.Daugelis
moka didelę kainą už labai žemą pastatų kokybę – šiaudų skydų namai suteikia
aukšto lygio komfortą tiek vasarą, tiek žiemą be žalos aplinkai.
Jei manote, kad šiaudiniai namai turi plisti.
Prancūzijoje didelis 7 aukštų pastatas bei mokyklos yra statomos
naudojant šiaudus kaip apšiltinamąją medžiagą. Nieko keisto: šiaudų skydai yra
atsparūs žemės drebėjimams, pasižymi gera šilumos izoliacija bei siekia 120
minučių gaisro atsparumą jei yra nutinkuoti molio tinku.
4.  Jei manote, kad atsparūs žemės drebėjimams
namai turi būti statomi ne tik iš betono.
Zonose, kuriose gausu žemės drebėjimų, šiaudiniai namai turi privalumą –
konstrukcijos lankstumą. Šiaudų skydai atlaiko didesnes apkrovas nei
apskaičiuotos medinių konstrukcijų apkrovos. Suspausti šiaudų skydai yra
laikančioji ir tuo pačiu lanksti konstrukcija, suteikianti išskirtinį saugumą
žemės drebėjimų zonose.
5.  Jei manote, kad pasyvūs namai turi būti iš natūralių
medžiagų.
2016 metais planuojamas Ecococon sienų sistemos sertifikavimas Pasyvaus
namo sertifikatu. Architektai lengvai gali pasiekti pasyvaus namo standartą
naudodami natūralias medžiagas.
6.  Jei manote, kad ekologiškumas svarbu.
Ecococon šiaudų skydai pateko į top 10 ekologiškiausių ir inovatyviausių
produktų visame pasaulyje. Ecococon skydai pateko tarp 10 finalistų Cradle to
Cradle inovacijų konkurse. 2016 metais tikimės pasiekti Cradle to Cradle
sertifikavimą, kas pagrįs produkto ekologiškumą.
7.  Jei manote, kad ekonomiškai efektyvi statyba
yra svarbi.
Ecococon yra modulinė statybos sistema, kurios surinkimas yra greitas ir
tikslus. Ar įmanoma pastatyti 400 m2 namą per tris dienas? Tai padarė Šveicarai
su 318 m2 Ecococon šiaudų skydų. Konstrukcijos dėka, statybos yra produktyvios
ir ekonomiškai efektyvios – ypač šalyse su brangia darbo jėga.
8.  Jei manote, kad architektūrinė laisvė
svarbi.
Jokių dizaino apribojimų! Visų tipų dizainai gali būti įgyvendinti
naudojant skirtingo dydžio skydus pagamintus pagal individualų projektą.
Architektai turi visišką laisvę projektavimui.
9.  Jei jums rūpi jūsų sveikata.
Gyvenkite
sveikuose namuose. Šiaudų skydai su molio tinku leidžia sukurti sveiką ir
ekologišką vidaus dizainą. Nėra nieko svarbiau nei mūsų sveikata. Šiandieninė
statyba gali turėti iki 50000 medžiagų, kurių didžioji dalis net nebuvo tirta
dėl toksinų.
