Costruire con pannelli di
paglia!
Ogni euro donato salva 2
tonnellate di CO2. Contribuisci a rivoluzionare l’edilizia!
In media una casa
costruita con pannelli di paglia (circa 140 mq di superficie muro) incamera più
di 10 tonnellate di CO2, anche dopo aver effettuato 500 km di trasporto su
strada verso il cantiere.
Inoltre ci sarà un
risparmio di circa 50 t di CO2 nei prossimi 50 anni, riducendo l’energia
necessaria per il riscaldamento e raffrescamento.
Se vi interessa ridurre le
emissioni di CO2, siete pregati di donare!!
Tutti vogliono vivere in un ambiente sano. Abbiamo una
tecnologia costruttiva unica utillizzando la paglia. La tua donazione aiuterebbe
a sviluppare una produzione efficiente rivoluzionando l'industria edilizia. Fai
parte di questo sviluppo!
I nostri elementi di paglia modulari sono stati un grande successo negli ultimi
10 anni, forniscono una soluzione ecologica economica, sana e assolutamente
necessaria per l'industria delle costruzioni. Crediamo che tutti hanno il
diritto di vivere in una casa confortevole con il beneficio per il nostro
ambiente.
Per raggiungere questo obiettivo abbiamo bisogno di produrre pannelli di paglia
più vicino a noi. Tutto questo è possibile solo se progettiamo macchinari di
produzione più efficienti!
Solo investendo pesantemente nello sviluppo di una nuova
generazione di macchine possiamo aumentare l'efficienza della produzione.
Con il vostro supporto si potranno sviluppare macchine di produzione ad alta
efficienza per la produzione locale e regionale. Un enorme potenziale per
salvare tonnellate di CO2 e di energia primaria, sia in fase di costruzione e
durante l'utilizzo dell'edificio. Non sarà solo per aiutare tutti noi, ma
rendere il mondo un posto migliore.
Quanta CO2 posso risparmiare con il mio supporto?
La produzione annuale di pannelli per 35 case consente di risparmiare 350t di
CO2, e altre  1750t di CO2 nel corso dei
prossimi 50 anni. Ma noi vogliamo fare meglio - con 150 case all'anno per ogni
nuovo ed efficiente sito produttivo, saranno risparmiate 1500t di CO2 all'anno
e otterremmo un risparmio di 7500t di CO2 nel futuro.
Se avessimo solo 10 siti produttivi in ​​esecuzione per 10 anni, la CO2
cumulato sarebbe pari a 150'000t  (sconcertante!)
e il risparmio di CO2 a lungo termine ad altre 750'000t.
Come utilizzeremo le vostre donazioni ?
Speriamo di raccogliere € 450'000  per
coprire tutti i passaggi elencati di seguito. Ciò significa che ogni € donato
ha il potenziale di salvare 2t di CO2!
Per avvicinarsi al nostro obiettivo generale abbiamo diviso il processo in alcune
fasi:
1. Sviluppo di una nuova, efficiente linea di produzione
Per questa fase abbiamo bisogno solo € 180'000. Questo è il nostro obiettivo
primario per questo progetto chiamato Indiegogo.
Se riceveremo più fondi, continueremo con la fase 2 e 3:
2. La certificazione delle macchine in modo che possa essere venduto in altri
paesi
3. contribuire a finanziare una o più linee di produzione in altri paesi
Anche se otteniamo meno, saremo in grado di raggiungere questi obiettivi, solo
ci vorrà un po’ più di tempo. E crediamo fortemente che il mondo non può più
permettersi di aspettare!
Abbiamo bisogno del vostro aiuto per sviluppare la nostra tecnologia di
produzione e iniziare una nuova linea di produzione. Ci auguriamo che ti
soddisfi il nostro pensiero di risparmio energetico e la creazione di modi di
salvare l'ambiente. Leggi i dettagli di seguito e sul nostro sito web
www.ecococon.eu e saremo lieti di rispondere a tutte le vostre domande.
Hai bisogno di eventuali ulteriori motivi  per donare? Eccoli:
1. Si prega di donare se si pensa che il settore delle costruzioni abbia
bisogno di un alternativa!
I pannelli di paglia offrono una soluzione ecologica economica, sana e
assolutamente necessaria per l'industria delle costruzioni. E’ responsabile di
quasi il 40% delle emissioni di CO2 a livello mondiale per la costruzione, il
riscaldamento e il raffreddamento. Questo è davvero uno spreco! Con le
tecnologie odierne e i materiali naturali disponibili, questo spreco può
facilmente essere abbassato a livelli sostenibili!
2. Si prega di donare se si vuole avere un impatto positivo sul benessere delle
persone!
Crediamo che tutti hanno il diritto di vivere in una casa confortevole che è
anche beneficio per il nostro ambiente. Molti pagano prezzi molto elevati per
gli edifici di qualità molto bassa - le case prefabbricate di paglia offrono un
elevato comfort termico in estate e in inverno, senza compromettere il nostro
ambiente.
3. Si prega di donare se si pensa all'indipendenza dei combustibili fossili,  a rendere il mondo un posto più sicuro per vivere!
Paglia, legno e argilla sono abbondanti in tutto il mondo -, applicando questi materiali
in modo efficiente possiamo abbassare la dipendenza dai combustibili fossili e
rendere il mondo un posto più sicuro dove stare.
4. Si prega di donare se volete la paglia nella costruzione ed andare contro corrente!
In Francia appartamenti e scuole sono costruite con  il materiale isolante in paglia. Non c'è da
stupirsi: i pannelli di paglia sono sicuri contro il terremoto, offrono un buon
isolamento e raggiungono la protezione antincendio di 120min quando sono
intonacati con argilla.
5. Si prega di donare se si pensa che gli edifici sicuri non devono essere
fatti solo da cemento!
Nelle zone terremotate, le case di paglia hanno un vantaggio - la flessibilità
di costruzione. La paglia compressa è portante e flessibile, fornendo sicurezza
eccezionale in zone sismiche.
6. Si prega di donare se si vuole fare un passo avanti con lo standard
Passivhaus!
Il sistema a parete Ecococon è in procinto di ottenere la certificazione
Passivhaus. Con l'implementazione di particolari esistenti, gli architetti
possono facilmente raggiungere lo standard passivo utilizzando materiali
naturali.
7. Si prega di donare se sei un fan del Cradle to Cradle concept!
I pannelli di paglia Ecococon sono stati indicati come uno dei top 10 tra la maggior
parte dei prodotti da costruzione ecologici e innovativi al mondo. I pannelli
Ecococon sono tra i 10 finalisti del Cradle to Cradle Innovation Challenge,
dimostrando chiaramente il potenziale ecologico del prodotto. Speriamo di
ottenere la certificazione completa Cradle entro il prossimo anno.
Inizio modulo
8. Si prega di donare se si pensa che i
costi efficienti di costruzione siano importanti!
Ecococon è un sistema di costruzione modulare a montaggio molto veloce e
preciso. Costruire una casa di 400m2 in tre giorni? Questo è ciò che ha fatto
la Svizzera con 318m2 di pannelli Ecococon. Grazie al nostro concetto, la costruzione
è efficiente ed economica - specialmente in paesi con alti costi del lavoro.
9. Si prega di donare se si vuole un sistema che prevede la libertà creativa dell'architetto!
Nessun limite al design! Tutto il disegno può essere assemblato con pannelli di
dimensioni diverse, prodotte su richiesta. L'architetto ha piena libertà di
progettazione.
10. Si prega di donare se siete preoccupati per la vostra salute!
Vivere in una casa sana! I pannelli di paglia con intonaco di argilla
permettono alle persone di creare un interno sano ed ecologico. Non c'è nulla
di più importante della nostra salute. Gi attuali edifici potrebbero includere
più di 50.000 sostanze, molte delle quali non sono mai state controllate per la
tossicità.
I tempi di sviluppo stimato
Attraverso un finanziamento flessibile ci permette di implementare diversi
stadi del nostro sviluppo tecnologico, a seconda di quanto denaro si può ricavare:
• Se con il vostro aiuto raggiungiamo € 180 000 , saremo in grado di creare
prototipi funzionali delle nuove macchine. Ciò contribuirà a sviluppare ed
espandere la nostra tecnologia di produzione.
Tempo previsto: 12 - 16 mesi dopo la fine della campagna.
• Se con il vostro aiuto raggiungiamo una cifra maggiore,  saremo in grado di muoverci per le prossime
tappe e raggiungere il nostro obiettivo generale più velocemente.
Se raccogliamo meno denaro di quanto sperato, investiremo  tutti i fondi raccolti in sviluppo macchinari
parziale e Vi terremo sempre aggiornati sui progressi.
Termine di consegna di vantaggi: tempo stimato di consegna è fino a 3 mesi dopo
la fine della campagna. Il termine di consegna può variare a causa di varie
condizioni, ma sarete informati se ci saranno cambiamenti. Ci metteremo in
contatto per chiarire tutte le questioni circa la consegna.
In caso di superamento della campagna, è possibile seguire tutti gli
aggiornamenti qui,  e sul nostro sito www.ecococon.eu.
La tecnologia Ecococon
La nostra tecnologia di produzione attuale richiede un sacco di lavoro manuale.
L'efficienza non è elevata. I 13 collaboratori altamente motivati ​​nella
produzione possono produrre annualmente pannelli per un massimo di 50 case. La
manodopera aumenta il prezzo del pannello e la linea di produzione è per il
momento troppo inefficiente per essere utilizzata in paesi con salari più alti.
Ma se vogliamo risparmiare energia e costruire ecologicamente, una soluzione
deve essere trovata per produrre più case in modo efficiente.
Il concept per la nuova linea di produzione ci consente di produrre pannelli
per 150 case all'anno, con soli 8 persone che lavorano. La linea di produzione
dovrebbe essere abbastanza semplice e, grazie alle macchine certificate, la produzione
potrebbe essere diffusa ad altri paesi. In questo modo il nostro prodotto sano
e benefico potrebbe diffondersi in un posto più vicino a te e contribuire a
creare molte nuove strutture di lavoro in tutto il mondo. Questo aiuterà a
proteggere il nostro ambiente a lungo termine.
Basso consumo di energia durante la produzione e l'uso esclusivo di materiali
rinnovabili è un grande inizio per un prodotto sano ed ecologico, un prodotto
che permette di risparmiare energia e offre comfort per le persone. E,
soprattutto, a causa delle risorse ampiamente disponibili utilizzate nella
produzione, può essere posizionato ovunque.
Ora la produzione è basata in Lituania e questa è l'unica fabbrica,  ma questa situazione sarà modificata con il vostro
aiuto. Le nuove linee di produzione forniranno nuove opportunità sul mercato
del lavoro e sosteranno una rete di piccole imprese che si preoccupano per
l'ambiente.
Storia di case di paglia
Quando le persone sentono parlare di case di paglia, ricordano spesso la fiaba dei
I Tre Porcellini. Nella fiaba il finale non era così felice, ma in realtà le case
di paglia sono edifici forti e caldi. Le persone hanno costruito case di paglia
dal 19 ° secolo. La più antica casa di paglia in Europa è a Montargis in
Francia - costruita nel 1921. Negli Stati Uniti nel Nebraska, l'edificio più
antico di paglia nel mondo ha più di 110 anni.
Le tecniche di costruzione di paglia si sono spostate in avanti e si è
dimostrato che le case di paglia sono molto calde e resistenti al fuoco. Questo
tipo di edifici potrebbe facilmente competere con case di mattoni
alternativa all’edilizia tradizionale. Anche nelle zone sismiche, le case di
paglia hanno un vantaggio
column2: è emerso che durante i terremoti in Cina e Pakistan le

column1: case di paglia non sono state distrutte a causa della loro flessibilità di
costruzione.
Pannelli di paglia Ecococon
Il team Ecococon ha creato un metodo unico per la pressatura di paglia in una
cornice per pannelli di altissima qualità. L'inizio non è stato facile, e solo
dopo aver trascorso molti anni con ricerche e sperimentazioni,  è stata sviluppata una tecnologia che ci
permette di produrre pannelli di paglia di alta qualità.
L'obiettivo principale era quello di creare una tecnologia che potrebbe fornire
più case ecocompatibili. I nostri pannelli sono materiali naturali, non
contengono componenti chimici. La paglia è un materiale da costruzione che è
abbondante. Utilizzando materiali rinnovabili nessun danno è fatto per
l'ambiente. Nel 2013, durante la partecipazione al concorso  Cradle to Cradle i pannelli di paglia Ecococon
sono stati indicati tra i  migliori 10
prodotti da costruzione ecologici e innovativi del mondo
http://www.sustainablebrands.com/news_and_views/design_innovation/10-finalists-cradle-cradle-product-innovation-challenge-show-what’s
Ecococon è un sistema di costruzione modulare, il montaggio è molto veloce e
preciso - si può vedere il processo di costruzione http://www.ecococon.lt/english/straw-panels/
Con le particolari e i
disegni forniti, una casa di medie dimensioni può essere costruita in 2-3
giorni utilizzando strumenti molto semplici.
I pannelli sono prodotti con pochissima energia incorporata. Ancora più
importante, le eccellenti caratteristiche di U-valore , trattenere il calore
farà risparmiare energia per il riscaldamento e il raffrescamento per tutta la
durata della costruzione. Contribuiremo a ridurre il riscaldamento globale.
La resistenza termica dei pannelli di paglia sono 0,056 W / mK con un
conseguente valore U di 0,107 W / m2K generale (R = 9.3), compreso un
pannello di fibra di legno 60-
100 millimetri all'esterno.
Il valore di isolamento formidabile del muro può
essere sufficiente per raggiungere
casa passiva standard.
La casa passiva standard non si vuole raggiungere
per il  solo basso consumo energetico, ma aumentare la qualità e la durata della costruzione. Garantisce inoltre un più elevato comfort
abitativo.
I pannelli di paglia vengono prodotti in base ad ogni singola progettazione. L'unicità della
tecnologia è la realizzazione di qualsiasi tipo di casa di design, ogni progetto può essere
costruito con pannelli di paglia.
I pannelli possono essere prodotti
individualmente con la larghezza e l'altezza 40-300cm 40-120cm.
Caricare architravi portanti, piani inclinati e angoli sono possibili
senza il cambiamento del materiale.
Lo spessore di 40 cm è di serie.
I pannelli di paglia permettono alle persone di creare un ambiente
sano ed ecologico nel loro
salotto. Per le pareti interne, utilizzando intonaco di argilla
si crea una piacevole microclima.
3 nuovi certificati supplementari nel
Con il sostegno dei fondi strutturali dell'Unione europea (30 000 €, il 50%
della somma complessiva) ci sarà nel mese di ottobre l’avvio di una procedura
per casa passiva, Cradle to Cradle e certificazione CE. Il processo di
certificazione dovrebbe essere completata nel giugno 2016.
Questi certificati forniranno ulteriore fiducia al nostro prodotto, e forniranno
ulteriori attenzioni  per la nostra
ricerca per portare la costruzione ecologica all’estremo.
Caratteristiche
• Utilizzo di solo materiali  rinnovabili
• Creazione di ambiente di vita sano e di grande microclima all'interno della
casa
• Nessun limite di progetto architettonico.
• Altissima resistenza al fuoco (intonaco di argilla sulla paglia raggiunge 120
min di protezione antincendio!)
• Isolamento Acustico – elevato confort
• I pannelli di paglia sono certificati
http://www.ecococon.lt/english/official-documents-certificates/
• Facilità ad ottenere un elevato risparmio energetico o standard di casa
passiva
• Dal 2013 valutazione tecnica N. nazionale NTI-01-061: 2013
http://www.ecococon.lt/english/official-documents-certificates/national-technical-approval/
• Uno dei primi 10 prodotti più ecologici in Cradle to Cradle concorso nel 2013
http://www.sustainablebrands.com/news_and_views/design_innovation/10-finalists-cradle-cradle-product-innovation-challenge-show-what’s
• Tutte le caratteristiche dei pannelli: http://www.ecococon.lt/english/straw-panel-characteristics/
Grazie!
Vorremmo ringraziare ciascuno sostenitore per il contributo donato,  per consentirci di sviluppare questo
progetto
column2: un prodotto necessario per l'ambiente. Vi preghiamo di aiutarci a

column1: condividere questo progetto attraverso tutte le fonti dei media che si
desidera, siamo molto grati per il vostro aiuto!
Se avete domande o commenti non esitate a contattarci al lina@ecococon.lt o
marius@ecococon.lt.
Come ringraziamento per il contributo,  abbiamo preparato degli oggetti ecologici con
il nostro marchio. Si prega di scegliere il più gradito e a fine campagna ci
metteremo in contatto con ognuno di voi personalmente, per conoscere che tipo
di Perks avete scelto e che  riceverete
per il vostro contributo. Meraviglioso!

Bouw met stropanelen!
Help de revolutie in de bouw! Elke gedoneerde €uro bespaart 2 ton CO2.
Gemiddeld bespaart een huis gebouwd van stropanelen (140m2 wandoppelvlak)
meer dan 10 ton CO2, zelfs als hiervoor 500km transport naar de bouwplaats
wordt meegerekend.. Daarnaast levert datzelfde huis de komende 50 jaar, door
zijn extreem lage energievraag voor verwarming en koeling nog eens een
besparing van 50 ton CO2, zelfs vergeleken met een goed geisoleerd huis.
Ø
Draag bij omdat je het verlagen van de CO2-uitstoot
belangrijk vindt!
Duurzame innovatie in de bouw
is broodnodig. Stropanelenbouw zorgt voor een ommekeer!
De bouwgerelateerde industrie is verantwoordelijk voor bijna 40% van de
wereldwijde CO2 emissie. Het gaat dan om gebouwverwarming- en koeling en de
bouwindustrie zelf.
Met de techniek van vandaag en met beschikbare natuurlijke materialen kan
deze verspilling makkelijk gereduceerd worden tot een duurzaam aanvaardbaar
niveau.
Ø
Draag bij als je vindt dat de bouw verduurzaamd moet worden!
Tijd voor verandering!
We geloven dat een ieder het recht heeft op een comfortabel onderdak dat
bijdraagt aan het milieu.
Er wordt erg veel geld betaald voor gebouwen met een gebrekkig
kwaliteitsniveau. Stropaneel bouw zorgt voor een natuurlijk binnnenklimaat, met
zeer hoge warmte en koude-isolatie, zonder het klimaat geweld aan te doen bij
de productie.
Ø
Draag bij als je ook denkt dat verandering nodig is!
Draag bij aan grootschalige
besparing van fossiele brandstof en CO2-uitstoot.
Stro, hout en leem zijn over de hele wereld
ruim voor handen. Door deze materialen efficiënt in te zetten kunnen we de
afhankelijkheid van fossiele brandstoffen en CO2-uitstoot belangrijk verlagen.
Ø  Draag bij als je ook gelooft dat onafhankelijkheid van fossiele
brandstof voor een betere wereld zorgt !
Revolutie
in de bouw!
Bouwen met stropanelen begint een serieus
alternatief te vormen voor traditioneel bouwen.
In Frankrijk worden al 7-hoge gebouwen en
scholen gebouwd met stro als isolatie. Dat is op zich  niet vreemd: stropanelen-bouw is
aardbeving-proof, zijn 120 minuten brandwerend, geven een optimale isolatie en
een fantastisch binnenklimaat (mits afgewerkt met leem)
Ø  Draag bij als je voorstander bent van een duurzame revolutie in de
bouw.
Bouw
aardbeving-proof !
Stropanelen-bouw is zeer schokbestendig.
Vanwege de opbouw uit houten delen en het feit dat de geperste stro
constructief en toch flexibel is, geeft het een uitstekende
aardbevingsbestendigheid.
Voor de aardgaswinningsgbieden in
Noord-Nederland zou het ideaal zijn als de schade van de aardgasindustrie
herstelt wordt met natuurlijke bouwmaterialen .
Ø  Draag bij als je ook vindt dat je geen beton moet terugbouwen in
aardbevingsregio’s
Makkelijk
een passief-huis bouwen met natuurlijke materialen!
Het Ecococon wandsysteem is bezig met
Passiefhuis-certificering. Daarmee wordt een passief huis niet alleen duurzaam
in energieverbruik maar ook in bouwmateriaal.
Ø  Draag bij als je vindt dat een passiefhuis van natuurlijke
bouwmaterialen een beter passief huis is!
Het
meest ecologische product in de wereld?
Ecococon
was met haar stropanelen een van de 10 finalisten in the
Cradle-to-cradle Innovation Challenge. Komend jaar wordt een volledig
Cradle-to-cradle certificaat verwacht.
Ø  Draag bij als je fan bent van het Cradle-to cradle concept.
Bouw
een huis in 1 dag !
Ecococon is een modulair bouwsysteem
waarmee zeer snel en precies gebouwd wordt.
Een huis van 400m2 bouwen in 3 dagen? Dat
deden ze in Zwitserland met 318m2 stropaneel van Ecococon. Met deze bouwmethode
kan efficiënt en kosten-effectief gebouwd worden
arbeidskosten.
Ø  Draag bij als je gelooft in snel en effectief bouwen.
Geen
beperking aan het ontwerp !
Het unieke van het bouwsysteem is dat het
geen beperkingen stelt aan het ontwerp. Elk project kan er mee gebouwd worden.
Het wordt samengesteld uit verschillende op aanvraag  geprefabriceerde “bouwstenen“. De architect
heeft volledige ontwerpvrijheid.
Ø  Draag bij als je gelooft in een bouwsysteem dat creatieve vrijheid aan
de architect biedt.
Leef
in een gezond huis !
Stropanelen afgewerkt met leem zorgen voor
een gezond binnenklimaat. In tegenstelling tot de traditionele bouw is bouwen
met stropanelen volledig cradle-to-cradle. In de wetenschap dat in traditionele
bouw zo’n 50.000 stoffen verwerkt worden, waarvan vele nooit op schadelijkheid
in het binnenklimaat getest zijn, is natuurlijk bouwen alleen al zeer de moeite
waard.
Ø  Draag bij als je gelooft in een gezond en natuurlijk binnenklimaat.",25.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Vilnius, Lithuania",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/developing-efficient-straw-panels-production/pica

What’s the Situation?
In the past 100 years mankind
have used up to 50% of natural resources and it is believed the scarcity of
resources would be critical by 2050. Moreover according to <span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
we are not even close to finding a new home …
The
Rain Forest: with more than 75 million acres and more than 1.8Million species
of plants and animals, the rain forest has become our most treasured asset in
the world. Unfortunately there are some companies from different industries
threatening to diminish the rain forest to its minimum expression: illegal
mining, not approved soil exploitation techniques, and the excessive
deforestation are the main reasons for the rain forest current reduction rate
by 100.000 acres every year
column2: this puts in danger several species of trees,

column1: animals, and even the humankind.
About Our Project
The Goal of this initiative for
Grupo Walking Colombia is to help preserve the fauna and flora of the Rain
Forest while delivering a high quality service to our community.
How does it work? It is very simple, given
that all our operations affect the environment, GWC Verde proposes allocating a
percentage of the profits we make on each sale to help our environment, and
establish self-sustaining internal procedures so we can provide high quality
service without neglecting the concept of environmental awareness.
Along with the help of our
customers, GWC will take care of that for every service, included in our
portfolio of services (flights, hotels, car rentals, etc.) will be a
collaboration as a donation to an ONG. Thus this donation will be translated
into a symbolic adoption of a tree, one acre of trees or turtle belonging to an
endangered species: Loggerhead (Caguama Turtle). For each completed adoption
GWC user will receive an adoption certificate, and if it is the case the
possibility of planting the tree adopted.
<div>
What is the impact in the long term?
GWC with the help from some ONGs and
some great advice from Jonathan Scott founder of The Center for Industrial
Productivity and Sustainability Foundation (http://www.cipsfoundation.com/)
currently based in Holland, we have been able to create a robust Business Model
capable of contributing to potentially save up to 2.600 acres of rain forest
per employee a year by delivering a high quality travelling service without
requiring any major investment and few resources.
Therefore as you contribute to
our cause you will simultaneously help to preserve the rain forest and its
surroundings. As Every person that donates money to this project will be
entitled to adopt a tree to be placed under protected areas, for people that
donate more than $20USD  you will be
entitled to adopt an endangered species called Caguama Turtle, and for every
$80USD one acre of rain forest. In addition, to this you will receive a
certificate with relevant information about the adoption you already made. Please leave your email to contact you when you make your donations
What’s our goal?
Our goal is to fundraise $47,750 USD
that will be dispersed discriminated as follows:

<div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe class=""embedly-embed"" height=""435"" src=""https://cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2FfQ0dqoUuOGQ%3Ffeature%3Doembed&amp
We are here to provide high
quality travelling services including flight plus hotels and eco-touristic
trips, and second to show humankind them that we all can be a part of the
solution simply by using sustainable products and services from
eco-friendly  companies like GWC
For more information please contact
us at administrative@grupowalikingcolombia.com
, for every donation you make you are helping us achieve our dream of providing
high quality travelling services while preserving our natural resources.

Project 

Since 25 years Johan Ernst Nilson has been exploring the world and he has seen animals disappearing in front of his eyes. Extinction of species is one of our major problems here on Earth. The aim of this walk across the Serengeti is to raise awareness and funds to stop the illegal poaching of African wildlife.

And that is not a walk in the park.

Profile 

Johan Ernst Nilson is one of the worlds leading explorers. He has accomplished 40 expeditions in 146 countries. The exploration has brought him to places like the jungles of Amazon, through the deserts of Sahara, across the Atlantic and Antarctic seas, through the forests of Alaska, across Greenland, to the highest point of all the seven continents and on a 525 day long world record journey from the North Pole to the South Pole with only natural powers.

GrowSocial is THE web platform (that can do all this and more)

We've been part of the local food/permaculture movement for years. We're a tight community  but what we don't have is ONE tool, that all of us can use. We're doing it-and we need your help. We've listened carefully to what you need. We'll continue to listen.  Read more- you won't believe what we've got for you! 

Building a Global Web Platform:

Imagine-in the center of your screen is your profile. Your profile tells the community who you are and what you do. Around you on your screen are other circles. These let you see at a glance if there are new entries to your localpedia (where all the cool people, including yourself are inputting info on the local plants, pest, conditions), events scheduled,  more people in your area who have joined, jobs posted, things for free or barter in your community-ALL BASED IN YOUR COMMUNITY and all centered around the sustainable, local food economy. Imagine that it is on the scale of FB so that everyone is there.   FREE...like FB, you put up a profile.  Like wikipedia, you enter information.

We'll be marketing the platform so you don't have to think about how you're going to sell your honey or your harvest, fill your class or get the word out about the permablitz. You see IF WE ALL GO TO THE SAME PLACE WE ALL FIND EACH OTHER QUICKLY! There's more but we don't have the space to outline it all here.

The business plan was developed from a social entrepreneurship course from Copenhagen Business School by a group of 29 passionate and committed people from all over the world. Of the  355 participants of the Copenhagen Business School (CBS) Social Entrepreneurship MOOC who submitted plans GrowSocial  received an honorable mention, and has been judged to have one of the top 10 business plans.

We have team members working for free but there are some skills we don't have. Some of us are digging deep into our own pockets to pay for things but we need to hire some talent that we don't have on our team.  It's a big undertaking. This is our PERMABLITZ and we're asking you to help us.

It will be global but feel local. The platform brings us together to help us elevate the local food system. We will share information on local conditions, harvests, sources, collaboration, etc. It also helps the people who want to support local food and agriculture find the places to buy local products and services.

This means the people working in the local food movement spend less time finding markets and sources and more time doing what they love. We all benefit from that by having better food and better communities.

A more just, verdant and healthy planet for all! 

Local food has so many benefits. Permaculturists help rebuild soil and nourish the land. Local food helps rebuild plant diversity, helps people reconnect to each other and nature, makes communities more resilient and provides opportunities for small businesses to form and thrive. Communities become healthier, happier, and friendlier.
It's all about you:

There are so many ways you can help.  We'd like your zip code/country info so we can look for clusters of interest so we know where to launch first. You can leave that on a private message here or on our FB page.  We'd love input on what features and functions you think this platform should have. We'd love volunteers to help with social media and research. Of course we'd love programmers who can volunteer their time. Most importantly, we need you to share, share, share! Find us on FB and message us there if you'd like to help. https://www.facebook.com/foodconnectsus

The situation of water is drastic.  Sao Paulo, Brazil, a district of some 40
million people, is estimated to run out of water this summer.  Every 21 seconds a child dies of a
water-related disease.  200 million hours
are consumed daily by women and children collecting water.  According to Water.org, the current “water crisis is the #1 global
risk based on impact to society (as a measure of devastation).”

column5: >And it’s not just a 3rd-World problem.
column9: > Some experts say California will run out of

column1: water within a year.  Do you know how many
rivers in the US are polluted beyond safe use?
Chances are there are traces of other peoples’ medication in
drinking water, and that’s with current purification technologies!  Oh- have you heard of frack water?  Have you ever seen it???
Hi.  We are Sonic Cavitation (“SonCav”), and we
have the solution to the global water crisis.  Here it is (she's a beauty, isn't she!):
It’s a sound
solution (literally- sound is a major component of the technology), to ALL of
the above.  It is helpful for the

>At the base of Dr. Glotov’s patented technology is the use of mechanical ultrasound to create, and control, cavitation.  Googling “cavitation” will explain it as the creation of a tiny air bubble in water, due to drastic instant changes in pressure.  Quickly after the bubble’s creation, the pressure of the surrounding water causes that air bubble to implode upon itself.  That nanosecond of implosion is a very violent reaction, creating incredible energy, including heat scientifically estimated to be around 5,000 Kelvin (on the low end), which translates to just under 10,000° Fahrenheit (roughly the surface temperature of the sun).  An excellent video capturing the power of a cavitating bubble at 27,500 frames per second can be found here (special shout-out to the folks at Smarter Every Day on You Tube

column6: >In layman terms, any matter passing through the SonCav Generator is flash-fried at 5,000 Kelvin, purifying everything.  Because new feedstock liquid is continually running through the machine at a constant controlled speed, the bath temperature of the total liquid is maintained at approximately 275°F, which is still hot, but manageable.  After passing through the SonCav Generator the 275°F liquid enters the Phase Separator, where it changes state from liquid to gas, with all physical impurities (now also decontaminated) falling to the bottom, and the once-liquid rising to the top as steam.  The steam then passes to a Condenser, where it is brought back to water- clean, 100% pure, H2O.  Notice I mentioned “any liquid”: this same technology can treat municipal wastewater, water contaminated in multiple industries’ production (think Coke, Levis, HP, etc.), and hydro fracturing flowback (frack water), to 100% pure, H2O.
>Justin McKie is a senior engineer with Xylem Water Solutions, the manufacturer of one of our Units' many components.  Here he speaks to us about his thoughts on our ""game-changing"" technology:

>Dr. Glotov’s machine had been in use for years in Lipetsk, Russia.  Dr. Glotov was a colonel general in the Russian army, and served as one of the directors of the technology division of their version of NASA.  He holds multiple advanced degrees, including a doctorate in Biology, and Masters’ Degrees in Biochemistry, Bioengineering, and Management.  There he used the technology to treat, or rather refine, Western Siberian Heavy Crude into diesel and jet fuel.  You may know that oil refining is little more than heating the crude oil to various degrees of high temperatures, yielding your desired output (gasoline, diesel, benzene, etc.).  This technology is exactly that: harnessing the heat energy of cavitation to yield a desired output.  Thus the SonCav Unit was originally used as a mini mobile oil refinery, fueling a large chemical plant, and Russian military aircraft, in Lipetsk.  Southwest Research Institute (www.SouthWestResearch.com), a well-respected oil &
column7: gas industry independent tester, visited the Unit in Lipetsk, saw it working, and confirmed samples of feedstock and yield to be as indicated.

column6: >Earlier this year SonCav proved the technology here in the United States, at our base facilities in Houston, Texas.  A brief video of the testing can be seen here:

>The Demonstration Unit is a remarkably simple machine, consisting of the SonCav Generator (a tailor-modified multi-stage pump), a feed pump, the motors and variable frequency drives to run both, an evaporator, and the piping to connect it all.

>With the concept proven via our spectacular prototype, we moved to assembly of the first full Field Unit.  That Unit rolled off our assembly line last month.  We quickly re-proved the technology with our full Field Unit, and a few weeks ago it entered into stress testing.  It will be ready for our use in 3 months. Here is a video taken back in April of a tour of the Field Unit being assembled:

>For SonCav Relief, there is not a moment to lose.  We have the opportunity to bring this technology to solve droughts in California, in Brazil, in the most arid villages in Africa.  We can provide clean water after hurricanes, earthquakes, and nuclear disasters.  We can clean oil spills and other human disasters affecting our planet’s water.  We can save lives in Central America and prevent water related rapes &
column7: suicides in India (yup- a real tragedy).  And we can do it at a fraction of current related technology costs, and an even smaller fraction of current technology energy use.  We are lean, mean, and green.

column3: >But we must start with a Demonstration Facility.  A location where prospective customers- municipal water districts, towns cities and states, Rotary clubs, UN projects, NGOs- can see a Unit operating for themselves, test their own water, and see first-hand how a SonCav Unit can accomplish their goals.  This testing will lead directly to disaster relief -ready Packages for deployment in earthquake, nuclear contamination, drought, hurricane, oil spill, and war zones.  Where clean water is needed, SonCav Units can provide.  Our cost to establish a Demonstration Facility, including having our own SonCav Unit on-hand for demonstration and by-invitation testing, is $1,000,000.  This will lead to our first revenue, which in turn will allow us to have the Demonstration Facility become self-sustaining.

column6: >We decided to go the crowdfunding campaign route because of speed to emergency / disaster relief deployment.  Certainly organizations such as Rotary, the U.N., Red Cross, etc., have special programs to help fund these efforts, and frankly it is they who will be obtaining the SonCav Units for use in their relief efforts, but it can take a year or longer to go through their grant / funding processes.  During just the time we were preparing this campaign, there was a major earthquake in Nepal and an oil spill in California
column7: we want to help now.  Not next year.  Your contribution today can have us with deployed SonCav Field Units in December.

column6: >Here’s the breakdown on costs / use of funds:

>There will be considerable economic benefit to the town where we establish the Demo Facility.  Consider that we expect to run 3 demonstrations per day, on a 6 day schedule.  NGOs, towns, cities, states, foreign governments, private companies with water issues- many will want to come and test their water in our Demo Facility.  So there will be a considerable amount of pure water produced- about 265,000 gallons per day- that will be given to the town.  But with an expected 3 persons visiting the town for each demonstration, there will be considerable economic benefits to our Demo Facility town also: almost 5,000 hotel room nights, and an estimated $350,000 in local expenditures.  Plus, we will charge a nominal fee for each demonstration, providing revenue so the Demo Facility is self-sustaining, and with revenue comes a tax responsibility owed to the host town, benefiting local residents and businesses.

>As noted above, the crowdfunding campaign is to raise the funds for the SonCav Unit.  The remainder of funds necessary for the Demo Facility, and any shortfall if we do not reach our crowdfunding goal, will be raised through concessions with the town we select for establishing our Demo Facility, and local businesses that will directly benefit from having our Demo Facility there.  Of course if we exceed our goal, the additional funds mean we can set-up faster, or even consider having multiple Demo Facilities in different towns.
>Please Help!  There are many ways you can....

>SonCav seeks help in bringing this green technology to humanitarian relief.  Please consider being a part of solving the drought, bettering peoples’ lives, and helping our environment, locally and globally.  And it can start in your hometown: we will seek to establish our Demonstration Facility in the town from which the highest cumulative funding comes.

>There are many ways in which you can help our efforts become reality, and in the process, be the solution to water, starting with making a pledge to our campaign (just select a level from the above-right).  Of course we have several unique perks that are really exciting, from receiving bottled water that was purified in a SonCav Unit, to personally meeting our genius inventor Victor, to even having you be able to adopt or name a SonCav Unit!  (Take a peek to the above-right to see them all.)
>Here's a listing of several additional ways where your assistance would be greatly appreciated!

column1: ","THE Drought Solution.
The situation of water is drastic.  Sao Paulo, Brazil, a district of some 40
million people, is estimated to run out of water this summer.  Every 21 seconds a child dies of a
water-related disease.  200 million hours
are consumed daily by women and children collecting water.  According to Water.org, the current “water crisis is the #1 global
risk based on impact to society (as a measure of devastation).”
And it’s not just a 3rd-World problem.  Some experts say California will run out of
water within a year.  Do you know how many
rivers in the US are polluted beyond safe use?
Chances are there are traces of other peoples’ medication in your
drinking water, and that’s with current purification technologies!  Oh- have you heard of frack water?  Have you ever seen it???
Hi.  We are Sonic Cavitation (“SonCav”), and we
have the solution to the global water crisis.  Here it is (she's a beauty, isn't she!):
It’s a sound
solution (literally- sound is a major component of the technology), to ALL of
the above.  It is helpful for the
environment, sustainable, and inexpensive. For example, we can treat wastewater to pure H2O for under $1,000 / acre foot, and we can desalinate seawater at just over $1 / kilo-gallon. We ask you
today to be a part of that solution, as we launch our humanitarian division.  YOU can change water in your home,
neighborhood, state, and indeed the world.
Please help us make the difference.
The details are below.  Thank you!
Introducing Sonic Cavitation Relief,  the ""green"" sound solution to drought, and so
much more.

Less than 4% of the Earth's water is drinkable.  And about half of that is in polar ice caps.  Water is the key to life.  In so much of the world there is no water.  Severe drought is everywhere.  In so many other parts of the world, where there is water, that water is poisoned by pollution.  Disease festers in the ponds and lakes.  Millions die from lack of water, and millions more from access to dirty water.

Few know more the effect of the drought in the United States than our civic leaders in California, who represent the millions affected daily by the lack of water.  The Honorable Miguel Pulido has been Mayor of Santa Ana, California, for more than 20 years.  Mayor Pulido is on the SonCav Board of Advisors.  In his own words...""
So 4% of the Earth's water is drinkable.  What if  we could use the other 96% of the world's water?  What if we could clean the polluted water?

Sure, we have desalination plants, and wastewater treatment facilities.  Chances are that those who are reading this get their water from one of the two.  Do you know how expensive a reverse osmosis desalination plant is?  They're more than a billion dollars, take 10+ years, to build, and are incredibly environmentally unsound.  They require massive energy to operate, and most dump super-high concentrations of salt back into the ocean!  This is a reverse osmosis plant discharge- it's almost entirely salt:
And with respect to municipal wastewater recycling, do you know that chances are high that there are trace elements of other people's medication in your drinking water???

SonCav has a patented and proven technology that will take any liquid feedstock (like seawater, and wastewater), purifying both the liquid and the solids (like salt, sand, etc.) within, yielding pure H2O, and the separated (now clean) solids.  The entire Unit is housed in a standard shipping container, so it is mobile and compact, super “green” (requiring very little energy to operate, and producing a purified “waste”), and super affordable.

The SonCav concept is complete.  The SonCav Unit engineering is complete.  The “proof of concept” is complete.  The SonCav Generator Prototype is finished and tested.  We took 50°F water into the Unit, and at 150 gallons per minute turned it to 278°F steam!  Modern math would say we needed 30,000HP to accomplish this
column2: we did it with a 75HP motor!  And the first full SonCav Field Unit rolled off the assembly line last month!  It’s now in stress testing for 2 months.

column1: What does this mean?  Desalination anywhere- everywhere- at a fraction of the current costs, responsibly.  Not in 10 years, at a cost of billions, like reverse osmosis plants, but now, within 6 months, and within each town’s, or company’s, budget.  And without the terrible environmental mess that comes with reverse osmosis.  Plus we can equally treat wastewater, and clean polluted lakes and rivers, to 100% pure H2O.

SonCav Relief has a humanitarian mission: to bring relief to the drought here in America, and across the globe.  But we are aware of needing to take baby steps first.  For our business, that means establishing a Demonstration Facility, where all can come to test their water and experience our technology for themselves.  The town to host our Demonstration Facility to showcase this incredible technology will be the first town to benefit from SonCav technology.  With your help, this can be your town.

Jess Rae Booth is CEO of ECO Integrated Technologies Inc., a major investor in Sonic Cavitation LLC, the entity created for master licensing across all industries in the United States.  Here he provides his testimonial on the importance of SonCav technology for humanitarian purposes.

The full cost to establish our Demonstration Facility is $1,000,000.  We are initiating a crowdfunding campaign to raise $300,000, which is the cost for SonCav Relief to acquire our own SonCav Generator for our Demonstration Facility.  The full budget breakdown can be found below.  In addition to numerous individual unique rewards for your help in ending the drought and water-based disease, the town generating the highest dollar value of combined contributions will be our first choice to visit for establishing our Demonstration Facility there.
Please scroll below for much more detail, such as:
·  What’s behind the technology,
·  Who we have on our Team,
·  Great videos on the technology and from our testing,
·  All the ways SonCav Relief will make a difference at home and abroad,
·  Details on all the different rewards we are offering,
·  Details on the different ways you can directly participate with SonCav Relief in ending the drought,
·  And much more!
Thank you!
DETAILED SUMMARY

One of Sonic Cavitation’s founders is this brilliant guy named Victor Glotov (he has a PhD, a few Masters, military accolades to boot, and is an all-around great guy).  Victor invented the first and only way to commercially harness massive energy inherent in a common occurrence called “cavitation”.

The end result is our ability to take any type of non-potable water (sea water, waste water, produced water, frack water, etc.) into our machine (a “SonCav Generator”), and the yield will be 100% pure H2O and separated (purified) solids.  Each Unit is completely mobile, and can purify 1 million liters (265,000 gallons) of water per day, requiring only 100KW / hour of energy!

In plain English, the energy costs to run our machine are 7/100ths of a penny per gallon in Houston, or 2/10ths of a penny per gallon in San Francisco (wow- water is a lot more expensive in SF).  Machines are coupled together to meet a particular town’s needs.  This is a lean, mean and green water purification machine.
The Technology

At the base of Dr. Glotov’s patented technology is the use of mechanical ultrasound to create, and control, cavitation.  Googling “cavitation” will explain it as the creation of a tiny air bubble in water, due to drastic instant changes in pressure.  Quickly after the bubble’s creation, the pressure of the surrounding water causes that air bubble to implode upon itself.  That nanosecond of implosion is a very violent reaction, creating incredible energy, including heat scientifically estimated to be around 5,000 Kelvin (on the low end), which translates to just under 10,000° Fahrenheit (roughly the surface temperature of the sun).  An excellent video capturing the power of a cavitating bubble at 27,500 frames per second can be found here (special shout-out to the folks at Smarter Every Day on You Tube

column1: In layman terms, any matter passing through the SonCav Generator is flash-fried at 5,000 Kelvin, purifying everything.  Because new feedstock liquid is continually running through the machine at a constant controlled speed, the bath temperature of the total liquid is maintained at approximately 275°F, which is still hot, but manageable.  After passing through the SonCav Generator the 275°F liquid enters the Phase Separator, where it changes state from liquid to gas, with all physical impurities (now also decontaminated) falling to the bottom, and the once-liquid rising to the top as steam.  The steam then passes to a Condenser, where it is brought back to water- clean, 100% pure, H2O.  Notice I mentioned “any liquid”: this same technology can treat municipal wastewater, water contaminated in multiple industries’ production (think Coke, Levis, HP, etc.), and hydro fracturing flowback (frack water), to 100% pure, H2O.
Justin McKie is a senior engineer with Xylem Water Solutions, the manufacturer of one of our Units' many components.  Here he speaks to us about his thoughts on our ""game-changing"" technology:
Some History

Dr. Glotov’s machine had been in use for years in Lipetsk, Russia.  Dr. Glotov was a colonel general in the Russian army, and served as one of the directors of the technology division of their version of NASA.  He holds multiple advanced degrees, including a doctorate in Biology, and Masters’ Degrees in Biochemistry, Bioengineering, and Management.  There he used the technology to treat, or rather refine, Western Siberian Heavy Crude into diesel and jet fuel.  You may know that oil refining is little more than heating the crude oil to various degrees of high temperatures, yielding your desired output (gasoline, diesel, benzene, etc.).  This technology is exactly that: harnessing the heat energy of cavitation to yield a desired output.  Thus the SonCav Unit was originally used as a mini mobile oil refinery, fueling a large chemical plant, and Russian military aircraft, in Lipetsk.  Southwest Research Institute (www.SouthWestResearch.com), a well-respected oil & gas industry independent tester, visited the Unit in Lipetsk, saw it working, and confirmed samples of feedstock and yield to be as indicated.
Earlier this year SonCav proved the technology here in the United States, at our base facilities in Houston, Texas.  A brief video of the testing can be seen here:

The Demonstration Unit is a remarkably simple machine, consisting of the SonCav Generator (a tailor-modified multi-stage pump), a feed pump, the motors and variable frequency drives to run both, an evaporator, and the piping to connect it all.

With the concept proven via our spectacular prototype, we moved to assembly of the first full Field Unit.  That Unit rolled off our assembly line last month.  We quickly re-proved the technology with our full Field Unit, and a few weeks ago it entered into stress testing.  It will be ready for our use in 3 months. Here is a video taken back in April of a tour of the Field Unit being assembled:
Why Crowdfunding?

For SonCav Relief, there is not a moment to lose.  We have the opportunity to bring this technology to solve droughts in California, in Brazil, in the most arid villages in Africa.  We can provide clean water after hurricanes, earthquakes, and nuclear disasters.  We can clean oil spills and other human disasters affecting our planet’s water.  We can save lives in Central America and prevent water related rapes & suicides in India (yup- a real tragedy).  And we can do it at a fraction of current related technology costs, and an even smaller fraction of current technology energy use.  We are lean, mean, and green.

But we must start with a Demonstration Facility.  A location where prospective customers- municipal water districts, towns cities and states, Rotary clubs, UN projects, NGOs- can see a Unit operating for themselves, test their own water, and see first-hand how a SonCav Unit can accomplish their goals.  This testing will lead directly to disaster relief -ready Packages for deployment in earthquake, nuclear contamination, drought, hurricane, oil spill, and war zones.  Where clean water is needed, SonCav Units can provide.  Our cost to establish a Demonstration Facility, including having our own SonCav Unit on-hand for demonstration and by-invitation testing, is $1,000,000.  This will lead to our first revenue, which in turn will allow us to have the Demonstration Facility become self-sustaining.

We decided to go the crowdfunding campaign route because of speed to emergency / disaster relief deployment.  Certainly organizations such as Rotary, the U.N., Red Cross, etc., have special programs to help fund these efforts, and frankly it is they who will be obtaining the SonCav Units for use in their relief efforts, but it can take a year or longer to go through their grant / funding processes.  During just the time we were preparing this campaign, there was a major earthquake in Nepal and an oil spill in California
column2: we want to help now.  Not next year.  Your contribution today can have us with deployed SonCav Field Units in December.

column1: Use of Funds
Here’s the breakdown on costs / use of funds:
A SonCav Unit     $300,000
Facility Staffing     $370,000
Licensing                 $100,000
Facility Set-Up       $100,000
Utilities                     $  12,000
Miscellaneous        $  58,000

There will be considerable economic benefit to the town where we establish the Demo Facility.  Consider that we expect to run 3 demonstrations per day, on a 6 day schedule.  NGOs, towns, cities, states, foreign governments, private companies with water issues- many will want to come and test their water in our Demo Facility.  So there will be a considerable amount of pure water produced- about 265,000 gallons per day- that will be given to the town.  But with an expected 3 persons visiting the town for each demonstration, there will be considerable economic benefits to our Demo Facility town also: almost 5,000 hotel room nights, and an estimated $350,000 in local expenditures.  Plus, we will charge a nominal fee for each demonstration, providing revenue so the Demo Facility is self-sustaining, and with revenue comes a tax responsibility owed to the host town, benefiting local residents and businesses.

As noted above, the crowdfunding campaign is to raise the funds for the SonCav Unit.  The remainder of funds necessary for the Demo Facility, and any shortfall if we do not reach our crowdfunding goal, will be raised through concessions with the town we select for establishing our Demo Facility, and local businesses that will directly benefit from having our Demo Facility there.  Of course if we exceed our goal, the additional funds mean we can set-up faster, or even consider having multiple Demo Facilities in different towns.
Please Help!  There are many ways you can....

SonCav seeks help in bringing this green technology to humanitarian relief.  Please consider being a part of solving the drought, bettering peoples’ lives, and helping our environment, locally and globally.  And it can start in your hometown: we will seek to establish our Demonstration Facility in the town from which the highest cumulative funding comes.

There are many ways in which you can help our efforts become reality, and in the process, be the solution to water, starting with making a pledge to our campaign (just select a level from the above-right).  Of course we have several unique perks that are really exciting, from receiving bottled water that was purified in a SonCav Unit, to personally meeting our genius inventor Victor, to even having you be able to adopt or name a SonCav Unit!  (Take a peek to the above-right to see them all.)
Here's a listing of several additional ways where your assistance would be greatly appreciated!
Forward an e-mail to 10 of your friends, asking
them to help us solve the drought and other water related tragedies.  We're happy to provide suggested text to copy & paste into your e-mail- just ask us (GKalinosky@SonCav.com)!
Write a letter to your mayor or town council to
encourage them to support SonCav efforts in an effort to attract the
Demonstration Facility to your community.  Again, for suggested text to copy & paste into your
letter, e-mail us and we'll e-mail you right back!  (GKalinosky@SonCav.com)
Tweet an announcement of your support for
efforts to solve water.  Here is a suggested tweet which you can edit at will

and then copy & paste to your Twitterverse: ""FINALLY a #green sound solution 2 the #drought and other global #water woes! Pls help their crowdfunding campaign at http://igg.me/at/LeanGreenDroughtSolutionMachine.""
Post to your Facebook page an announcement of
your support for efforts to solve water.  Here is a suggested post which you can edit at will
and then copy and paste to your Facebook page
column2: ""Hi everyone-  We may FINALLY have a #green sound solution to the #drought and other global #water woes! Pls take a look at this crowdfunding campaign: http://igg.me/at/LeanGreenDroughtSolutionMachine.  Let's help them get launched.""

column1: Text 5 of your friends to check out our
crowdfunding campaign.  Here is some suggested wording for such a text
column3: a solution to local and global water woes.""

column1: A quick note that if you are kind enough to contribute to our campaign, after clicking on the contribution level and corresponding reward above, and going through the payment process (can be by major credit card or PayPal), you will have one-click options to post to Facebook, tweet on Twitter, or even auto-generate an e-mail to send, with all the text already filled out and waiting for you to edit of just send.  Please do take a moment to help us get the word out by clicking on those easy links.  Thank you so very much.
Team Profiles
Peter Dizer brings
30 years of significant management and finance experience to SonCav from the
worlds of private banking and information technology.  He formerly served with several top global
banks, including Bank of America, Royal Bank of Canada, and BNP Paribas.  Peter is an original founder and principal in Sonic Cavitation
Ltd., the master global distributor of SonCav technology, and serves as a SonCav
Director.

Dr. Victor Glotov is the inventor of SonCav’s technology. He holds multiple advanced degrees, including a doctorate in Biology, Masters’ Degrees in Biochemistry, Bioengineering, and Management, and a “1st degree license for operations with financial documents” of the Russian Ministry of Finance.  He is a former director of the Technology Division for the Russian aerospace program, and held the rank of Colonel General.  Dr. Glotov is a principal in SonCav, and serves SonCav as Chief of Technology and a Director.

Dr. Hans Franke holds a combined Ph.D. in Organic Chemistry and Business Administration, and formerly headed a number of research groups at Chevron Chemical Company, prior to taking the helm as President of Chevron France.  He was named to the same position at Chevron India but “retired” prior to assuming the post.  He has authored multiple patents, being directly involved with the legal processes for each.  Hans is a member of SonCav’s Advisory Board.

James H. Haig is an engineer who has held national and international sales director positions for a number O&G industry companies, such as Amoco Orient, Landmark (where he was Director - Saudi Aramco), and Paradigm Geophysical.  He founded and served as President of Staag Imaging, which he eventually sold to Schlumberger’s WesternGeco, serving as his own legal counsel for the sale.  Jim is our single largest angel investor from our Phase 1 capital raise, and a member of SonCav’s Advisory Board.

Grace Kalinosky recently graduated from the American University with a degree in business, specializing in entrepreneurship and marketing. She is passionate about preserving Earth’s natural resources and is our chief-proponent that SonCav’s technology can change the world. Grace is responsible for a variety of tasks including administrative support of / for SonCav’s executive team, and holds direct responsibility for SonCav social media, and the SonCav Relief crowdfunding campaign.

The Hon. Miguel Pulido has been Mayor of Santa Ana, CA, for 20 years.  And not just a super-star California mayor who understands first-hand the issue of major drought, Miguel is a mechanical engineer, who appreciates first-hand how the SonCav Unit works.  Miguel has been a respected leader within the U.S. Conference of Mayors, including chairing their Energy Committee, and is firmly established within the State of California and beyond.  Miguel is a member of SonCav’s Advisory Board.

Ron Swanson, Esq. served formerly as General Counsel for DaimlerChrysler Finance- Caribbean & Central America, prior to establishing his own practice focusing on structured finance, private placement offerings, personal and institutional investments, and related business counsel. He has successfully launched and sold several companies.  Ron serves SonCav as acting CEO, and is General Counsel and Director of Sonic Cavitation Ltd.",15.0,5,"1 Campaign

    • ","Eco-Village battles for survival
This is an film about how and why people choose to live off grid.
TV wants primped and preened ""perfect families"" or else dumbass survivalists to be mocked in a reality series.
This film is both passionate about our Civil Liberties and highly informative about exactly how to live off the grid in comfort and style.
Runnymede Eco-Village started three years ago - Its a successful, vibrant, growing community.
Noam Chomsky has endorsed the Village, and this project. In the trailer you can see him talking about the eco-village as a  symbol of the battle to save the environment

By juxtaposing their story with the 800th Magna Carta anniversary, we raise issues about personal freedom and society's rejection of a lifestyle that harms no-one and can help our planet, and our civilisation survive.

The Village has already had media coverage - but nobody has told the story from the inside over an extended period of time, with key interviews from all the players including local History professor Justin Champion, one of the world's leading experts on the Magna Carta.
What We Need & What You Get

Until now, the many hours of filming to capture life inside the Eco-Village has been done for a few hundred pounds.  But we need the money to pay for an experienced crew and good equipment for a few days, and above all an experienced editor who can take the material and help shape it into a compelling film
Then there is music and final production quality checks before the film can be released and marketed at festivals.

I will not be taking a penny myself, but the professionals whose skills are needed do need to be paid a market rate. As well as knowing you helped make the film and receiving a copy yourself, you can donate enough for an on-screen credit, producer status, and in case of larger donors, if you are interested I will give you a personal tour of this eco-village and/or others like it.
Telling a global audience that they too can leave clean, green lives, at low cost and free - outside the system
We will release this film by September 2015:  It will provide an inspiration for similar projects around the world
And be a reference point for  techniques and social organisation
On our Youtube site you can see over 90 short film made with off-gridders around the world (youtube.com/offgridnick)
Now please help us make a long film that covers the world in more detail
They may be evicted before the year ends
Court proceedings have started, and the eco-village might be short-lived, but its residents will scatter across the UK and Europe, starting other communities.
We are already filming at several other communities. So even if we have to go elsewhere to finish the film, your funding will enable us to do so.
I have been an award-winning documentary maker for 20 years and I always finish the projects I start.
I hope you can join the quest
Even if you cannot donate right now
Please send us your own videos of off-grid communities
Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Runnymede, United Kingdom",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/noam-chomsky-s-magna-carta-eco-village-documentary/pica

THE STORY
L’idée de la création de la Green Countries est
venue tout d'abord du manque de structure de communication et d'information en
côte d'ivoire et dans la sous-région ouest africaine sur les aspects relatifs
au développement durable. Le manque de comportements citoyens et les
gaspillages constatés dans la société ont aussi été les causes de la création
de cette startup. Le constat aussi a été de voir de nombreux enfants et de
familles dépourvu de nourriture pendant qu’une grande quantité de réserves
alimentaires sont jetés à la poubelle. Le souci de la création de la Green
Countries était donc d'informer de sensibiliser les populations sur les
comportements responsables en société mais aussi de lutter contre le gaspillage
à travers un vaste réseau de distribution des invendus
OBJECTIF
La Green Countries est né le 1er décembre
2014, ses objectifs sont en premier, d’être une plateforme éducative et de
sensibilisation pour les bonnes pratiques en société. En deuxième, de favoriser
la revalorisation des produits alimentaires et non-alimentaires à destination
des acteurs associatifs.
EVOLUTION
Depuis sa création, la Green Countries à travers les
partenariats qu’elle s’est noué à contribuer à la promotion d’actions
nationales et sous régionales sur le développement durable. Elle a lancé
certains de ses services dont la Green Company qui consiste à faire la
communication digitale sur les pratiques responsables des entreprises, elle a
développé une approche avec les écoles à travers son projet Green School pour
la mise en œuvre d’une démarche durable au sein des établissements basés sur
l’agenda 21 scolaire. De même à travers la Green Window qui est un service
proposé aux hôtels, restaurants et sites touristiques, elle propose une
stratégie de lutte contre le gaspillage. La Green Countries a initié la Green
Market, une bourse virtuelle pour faire la promotion des invendus par un réseau
d’émetteurs et de récepteurs à travers une application et des messages
téléphoniques.
STATE PLACES  AND  WHY WE NEED MONEY?
La Green countries contient en son
sein une équipe jeune et dynamique  dont
5 agents permanents  et 2 membres non
permanents. Ses agents se déplacent sur fonds propres et disposent de peu de
moyens techniques  pour travailler.
Malgré cela, la Green Countries a pu nouer 17 partenariats nationaux et
internationaux et participer à des événements majeurs en Côte d’Ivoire tel que
le Salon Africain des Ressources Animales (SARA 2015). La Green Countries
est  associé au patronat Ivoirien dans
toutes les activités relatives au développement durable. Elle a même été
associée au forum RSE TOGO (Responsabilité Sociétale des Entreprises) qui se
tiendra dans le mois de septembre. La green Countries dispose d’un site web
dont la visibilité est supérieur à 8000 vue par mois d’une page Facebook
principale  de plus de 2000 like  et de trois pages Facebook projets. Nous
avons en plus des services du site Web, 4 autres services dont le plus
dynamique est celui qui consiste en la lutte contre le gaspillage. En plus des
difficultés techniques et financières que rencontre la Green Countries la
compréhension du développement durable en Afrique et plus particulièrement en
Côte d’Ivoire est encore faible. Il faut beaucoup plus de communication à la
Green Countries pour faire passer son message. Pour toutes ses raisons techniques
financières et dans un souci d’impact plus perceptible, nous vous demandons de
soutenir la startup Green  Countries dans
sa levée de fonds .Cette levée de fonds qui favorisera le développement de ses
activités dont la conséquence est la construction d’une société durable.

La Green Countries est né le 1er décembre
2014, ses objectifs sont en premier, d’être une plateforme éducative et de
sensibilisation pour les bonnes pratiques en société. En deuxième, de favoriser
la revalorisation des produits alimentaires et non-alimentaires à destination
des acteurs associatifs.
EVOLUTION
Depuis sa création, la Green Countries à travers les
partenariats qu’elle s’est noué à contribuer à la promotion d’actions
nationales et sous régionales sur le développement durable. Elle a lancé
certains de ses services dont la Green Company qui consiste à faire la
communication digitale sur les pratiques responsables des entreprises, elle a
développé une approche avec les écoles à travers son projet Green School pour
la mise en œuvre d’une démarche durable au sein des établissements basés sur
l’agenda 21 scolaire. De même à travers la Green Window qui est un service
proposé aux hôtels, restaurants et sites touristiques, elle propose une
stratégie de lutte contre le gaspillage. La Green Countries a initié la Green
Market, une bourse virtuelle pour faire la promotion des invendus par un réseau
d’émetteurs et de récepteurs à travers une application et des messages
téléphoniques.
STATE PLACES  AND  WHY WE NEED MONEY?
La Green countries contient en son
sein une équipe jeune et dynamique  dont
5 agents permanents  et 2 membres non
permanents. Ses agents se déplacent sur fonds propres et disposent de peu de
moyens techniques  pour travailler.
Malgré cela, la Green Countries a pu nouer 17 partenariats nationaux et
internationaux et participer à des événements majeurs en Côte d’Ivoire tel que
le Salon Africain des Ressources Animales (SARA 2015). La Green Countries
est  associé au patronat Ivoirien dans
toutes les activités relatives au développement durable. Elle a même été
associée au forum RSE TOGO (Responsabilité Sociétale des Entreprises) qui se
tiendra dans le mois de septembre. La green Countries dispose d’un site web
dont la visibilité est supérieur à 8000 vue par mois d’une page Facebook
principale  de plus de 2000 like  et de trois pages Facebook projets. Nous
avons en plus des services du site Web, 4 autres services dont le plus
dynamique est celui qui consiste en la lutte contre le gaspillage. En plus des
difficultés techniques et financières que rencontre la Green Countries la
compréhension du développement durable en Afrique et plus particulièrement en
Côte d’Ivoire est encore faible. Il faut beaucoup plus de communication à la
Green Countries pour faire passer son message. Pour toutes ses raisons techniques
financières et dans un souci d’impact plus perceptible, nous vous demandons de
soutenir la startup Green  Countries dans
sa levée de fonds .Cette levée de fonds qui favorisera le développement de ses
activités dont la conséquence est la construction d’une société durable.",5.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Abidjan, Cote d'Ivoire",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/improve-sustainabledevelopment-education-in-africa/pica

Exxpedition Story
Unseen pollution Unseen toxicity Unseen women
Making the unseen seen through fact and story.

In November of this year an all female crew will cross the Atlantic, scientists and sailors working together to raise awareness of the levels of toxicity in the oceans and also to find new ways to give young women information about how to look after their bodies and their health.

As the Exxpedition storyteller I will be telling and creating stories of adventure with authentic facts and figures to inspire young women to look after their health and reach for their goals as well as take ownership and care of our oceans.
I have been a storyteller for fourteen years, telling stories at The National Portrait Gallery, hundreds of schools and festivals.
I have completed residencies with The Roald Dahl Foundation, The National Centre for Childrens's Books and Brunels' S.S Great Britian. In 2014 I told stories to more than 8,000 people.
""It should tour the world"" Lyn Gardner, the Guardian
""You are brilliant"" Ricky Gervais, comedian
What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

We are looking to raise £5.775 for this project. These funds will cover the hire of the boat, scientific and sailing equipment and training. Also some travel costs, I will be covering over half of the travel costs myself.

I will be donating my time for free to fulfil all unique perks and promises.

Upon my return I will be performing in a range of venues to reach as many young women as possible. The aim of the performances is to inform and inspire.

Each donor, if desired will be fully credited on any promotional material and fully acknowledged  at public events. 

Thank you 

Your contribution will make a huge difference.

column1: I have a successful track record with projects like this, recently holding a Welcome to Earth party  for children who had experienced birth trauma and the results were phenomenal.

I believe in the power of storytelling and it's uses as an educational tool are well documented. We are still telling stories of damsels in distress and women who need saving. The recent box office successes of Frozen and Brave have proved that the world is ready for a different story. Stories where women have the power to choose, go on adventures and there ideas are listened to.

Going into schools and telling new stories will enliven and inspire the school to think differently about girls and the role models they are introduced to.If we feel empowered we can make change and we take take on responsibility for the world around us, the oceans and our bodies.
Risks &

It will be a challenge to create stories that have a big impact but I have been creating stories for the S.S Great Britain for seven years so am used to sea faring tales. The experience of sailing the Atlantic alongside taking part in the scientific aspect of the journey will qualify me to overcome these hurdles.

Other ways you can help
If you love the idea but do not have the means to donate then please share this campaign widely so that others can help.
If you have time or skills to offer then please get  in touch. Thefullmooney@gmail.com
If we surpass our funding goal
I would love to take this project into schools nationwide, work with a director and musician and director to make it unforgettable  and create some online resources.

Summary
What would you do if every year, ten
thousand people showed up in your backyard, had a huge party, and then forgot
to clean up after they left?
That's what happens every Fourth of
July on Anna Maria Island.  While many visitors do take their trash with
them, sadly, there is still a lot of plastic, glass and aluminum that gets
forgotten.
Not only is all this trash a blight
on the shoreline landscape, it presents a real danger to the locals.  And
by “locals” here, I mean the gulls and gopher tortoises, the manatees and rays,
and the loggerheads and dolphins, the pompano, and snook, the tarpon and the
pelicans.  I mean the real locals, the ones who deserve our respect and
need our help more than ever.
Our plan is simple: we want to rally
just 100 volunteers to show up at 7AM on the morning of July Fifth, and clean
Holmes Beach.  That’s it.
If we can get a hundred volunteers,
we believe we can clean the entire shoreline of Holmes Beach, and leave it, and
the gulf, a cleaner, safer home for the locals, and for all us guests, as well.
What We Need &
Here are the details:
•
We need posters to get the word out
locally.
•
We need water and trash bags for our
volunteers who come out to clean up on the Fifth of July.
•
We need to thank our volunteers with a
t-shirt that will remind them of the great time they had cleaning up Holmes
Beach (because it will be fun!).
•
We need $3000.00.  That's 100
supporters giving $30 each.
•
For a $30 contribution, you'll
receive a ""Respect the Locals"" Sponsor t-shirt and a “Respect The
Locals” sticker, and also provide a ""Respect The Locals"" t-shirt for
one of our volunteers, along with water and trash bags.  And you’ll help us offset the cost of

promotional posters.

•
If we don’t reach our goal, we will
still honor our perks, and we will get as many volunteer t-shirts as possible,
and give them out to volunteers on a first-come basis.
•
If we exceed our goal, we will still
only buy enough t-shirts for 100 volunteers.
Anything left over will go to Anna Maria Island Turtle Watch.
The Impact
Are we going to change the
world?  Probably not in one day.  But we are going to clean our little corner
of it.
And with that small action, with our
tiny campaign, people will begin taking notice.  Our volunteers will take a measure of pride in
having been a part of taking care of something as precious as our
shoreline.  Our donors will feel good
about having contributed to something so worthy.  Others will see this example and start
thinking about taking a trash bag with them when they visit Anna Maria Island.  Or maybe they will think about a local
campaign they can start.
When my kids were little, they had to
gather at least two pieces of trash whenever we packed up after a day at the
beach.  After a while it became a game:
each kid trying to outdo the other by finding more than just two pieces of
trash.  It was fun and it taught them to
leave the world better then how they found it.
That’s the real impact of our little
campaign: showing people that they can make a difference.
Risks &
The biggest risk this campaign faces
is that we don’t receive any sponsors from IndieGoGo, and don’t have swag to
hand out to our volunteers.  I believe
people will come anyway, because I believe people will rally around a noble
cause.
Either way, we are promoting the
campaign with posters at local businesses, through Facebook and Twitter.  We feel confident we can get the volunteers
they may just have to go without t-shirts.
Other Ways You Can Help
Seriously, some folks cannot afford
$30.  We get that.  No worries:
•
If you’re local to the Bradenton
area, just show up at the Public Beach at the end of Manatee Avenue at 7AM on Sunday, July 5<sup>th</sup>!  Hopefully, we will have a t-shirt in your
size.  Our trash bags are one size fits
all!
•
If you’re not in the Bradenton area,
but you love beaches and turtles and hate trash, give us a shout on social
media!
•
And don’t forget to use the Indiegogo
share tools!
And that's all there is to it.

This pilot Ecological business is supported by international network of palm oil players for sustainable palm oil www.rspo.org. Our pilot program is aware of and responsive to climate and deforestation issues.

column3: >What does Ecological Palm Oil EPO mean?

column6: >It is an endangered natural and environmental  species of tree that produces fruits that can be processed to get fluider oils and 100% natural Soap with 0% of chemicals use. It is so sustainable and environmental as it doesn't use any chemicals but compost. Its kernel shell (Picture Below) is so resistant and inflammable to replace wood charcoal so that we limit deforestation in Africa and world...
